Esta comerciante de 50 años de edad, cuenta afortunadamente con el apoyo de una de sus hijas y de su esposo, quien también es otro emprendedor que tiene una vulcanizadora. 
Las metas de Celina son grandes, pues quiere llegar a tener una gran distribuidora o por lo menos encaminarla a ella para que la sigan sus hijos. Por esta razón, desea invertir mucho en este negocio, por lo que solicita un préstamo para comprar jabón, café, leche, pan, arroz, frijoles, entre otros productos de alta demanda por sus clientes.  Ayuda a que esta emprendedora cumpla con sus sueños.
texts.en:
Eight years ago Celina decided to begin a convenience store at her own expense. She always had the business in her mind and with it she has been able to get ahead with her family. This 50 year old merchant counts herself fortunate to have the help of one of her daughters and her spouse, who also is an entrepreneur who has a business vulcanizing rubber.

Celina's goals are big, she wants to have a large grocery store or at least direct it that way so that her children can follow up. For this reason, she would like to invest a lot in this business and that's why she is asking for the loan to purchase soap, coffee, milk, bread, rice, beans, among other products of high demand from her customers. Help this entrepreneur realize her dreams.

loans.use: to purchase soap, coffee, milk, bread, rice, beans, among others.

loans.name: Maria Edelmira

texts.es:
El sonido de la aguja atravesar la tela y tocar la tabla de la máquina de coser, es la música que escucha todos los días María, una emprendedora mujer que lleva más de 33 años cociendo para poder sacar adelante, como madre soltera, a sus tres hijos. Ella aprendió con la ayuda de una amiga, quien fue su profesora y motivadora. Fue cuando empezó su camino en el mundo de la costura, el cual combinaba con ofrecer sus servicios de lavandería y planchado en las casas de su vecindario. 
Ahora esta mujer de 57 años de edad se siente muy orgullosa de ver a sus hijos independientes y realizados, quienes al ver a sus madre como un gran ejemplo a seguir no dudan un segundo para apoyarla en su negocio. Esta motivación la ha llevado a solicitar un préstamo para comprar telas, hilos, agujas, tijeras, entre otros materiales indispensables para poder ofrecer un servicio de calidad. Su sueño es expandirse hasta el país vecino, donde pudiera ofrecer sus servicios, sin dejar su país de nacimiento.
texts.en:
The sound of the needle going through the fabric and touching the bed of the sewing machine is the music that Maria hears every day. She is an entrepreneurial woman who has spent more that 33 years sewing in order to be able to raise her three children as a single mother. She learned with the help of a friend, who was her teacher and motivator. That was when she began her career in the world of sewing, which she was combining with offering her washing and ironing services in houses of her neighborhood.

Now this woman of 57 feels very proud, seeing her children raised and independent. They, seeing their mother as a great example to follow, do not hesitate for a second to help her in her business. This motivation has brought her to apply for a loan to purchase fabrics, threads, needles, and scissors, among other indispensable materials, in order to be able to offer quality service. Her dream is to expand up to the neighboring country, where she could offer her services without leaving the country of her birth.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, threads, needles, and scissors, among other items.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy three bales of used clothing.

loans.name: Santa Rosa Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado “Santa Rosa” está en su 4º ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres, además están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, luchando por mejorar su situación de pobreza, a través del trabajo unido y sumado a las capacitaciones que les va haciendo la fundación paraguaya.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Elisa, quien es una mujer muy trabajadora y sacrificada, que con lucha y esmero está saliendo adelante para poder ser alguien en la vida y poder ayudar a sus seres queridos. Elisa tiene una despensa en la que todos los días trabaja desde muy temprano, hasta tarde en la noche, y por medio de su esfuerzo ayuda a sus seres queridos.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de productos cárnicos, bebidas, panificados y otros, y con ello poder crecer en su emprendimiento y seguir ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
The group called "Santa Rosa" is in its 4th cycle of the Women's Communal Bank Program. In addition, they are completing the elimination of poverty survey, and fighting to improve their situation of poverty through teamwork and the training courses that Fundación Paraguaya is conducting for them.

One of the members, Señora Elisa, is a very hardworking and dedicated woman, who with struggle and diligence, is moving forward so that she can be somebody in life, and help her loved ones. Elisa has a grocery store in which she works from very early in the morning until late at night, and through her efforts, she helps her loved ones.

She is requesting this loan for the purchase of meat products, beverages, baked goods, and other items. With this, she can grow her business and continue helping her family.

loans.use: to purchase meat, beverages, baked goods, and other items.

loans.name: Jackellin Rosario

texts.es:
El crecimiento y el avance de las tecnologías, significan un gran progreso la humanidad, según Jackellin, una joven de 22 años de edad, quien está a punto de graduarse como Ingeniera en Sistemas. Anteriormente había solicitado un préstamo para pagar la mensualidad de su carrera, la cual está en su recta final, razón por la que agradece de corazón a todas las personas que le apoyaron con ese crédito que la le ha ayudado estar casi con título en mano. 
Jackellin cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo y de sus padres, quienes son agricultores y sueñan con verla trabajar com toda una profesional. Afortunadamente también cuenta con unas remesas que mensualmente sirven para los gastos universitarios. Este balance emocional y económico, le ha permitido invertir de nuevo en su educación, esta vez solicitando un préstamo para pagar su curso de titulación y poder tramitar su título universitario.  Con esto podrá convertirse oficialmente como ingeniera y podrá optar por un trabajo acorde a sus estudios. Al terminar su carrera está considerando entrar a un curso de inglés, puesto que piensa que es indispensable actualmente.
texts.en:
The growth and advancement of technology signifies great progress in humanity, according Jackellin, a 22 year old youth who is at the point of graduating as a Systems Engineer.

Previously she had asked for a loan to pay the monthly fees of her university degree, of which she is in the final stretch. She thanks all of the people who helped with this loan with all of her heart, as they have helped her to almost have the degree in her hand.

Jackellin has the help of her spouse and her parents, who are farmers and dream of seeing her work as a professional. Fortunately she also has remittances which help with monthly costs of the university. This emotional and economic balance has allowed her to invest in her education again.

This time she is asking for a loan to pay for her degree course and to be able to process her university title. With this she will be able to officially become an engineer and will be able to select a job commensurate with her studies. Upon finishing her degree she is considering entering an English course, which would currently be indispensable.

loans.use: to pay for her degree course and to be able to process her university title.

loans.name: Sixta

texts.es:
La socia Sixta se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de comida, la socia por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a su familia,la socia es una mujer muy trabajadora que le gustaria abror otros restaurantes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar pollo,huevos, verduras, arroz y carne.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sixta continues with the business of selling food. With this business, she wants to get ahead with her family. She is a very hard-working woman who would like to open other restaurants.  She is requesting a loan to buy chicken, vegetables, rice, and meat. 

She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments.

loans.use: purchase chicken, eggs, vegetables, rice, and meat

loans.name: Lesly Valeria

texts.es: Lesly es una joven laboriosa de 23 años, es acompañada y tiene dos hijos por quienes trabaja duro para sacarlos adelante, desde hace cinco años ella se dedica a la venta de ropa, es el séptimo ciclo que solicita el financiamiento de la institucion porque desea agrandar su negocio al ofertar más mercadería, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de camisas, pantalones, vestidos y sandalias. Uno de los logros obtenidos con créditos anteriores fue comprar una cocina.
texts.en:
Lesly is a hardworking young woman, age twenty-three. She lives with her partner and she has two children for whom she works hard, in order to support them.

She has been selling clothing for five years. This is the 7th cycle in which she is requesting financing from the institution, because she wants to expand her business by offering more merchandise. She is requesting the loan for the purchase of shirts, pants, dresses, and sandals.

One of the goals that she achieved with previous loans was the purchase of a stove.

loans.use: to purchase shirts, pants, dresses, and sandals.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
La socia Maria Del Carmen se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de ceviche,la socia por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a su familia,la socia quiere tener otro restaurant ya que es una mujer muy trabajadora. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar pescado,limon y camote.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Maria Del Carmen continues with the business of selling ceviche. With this business she wants to get ahead with her family. She wants to have another restaurant, since she is a very hard-working woman. She requests for the loan to buy fish, lime, and sweet potato. 

She is happy about the loan, and pledges to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy fish, lime, and sweet potato

loans.name: Carlos Orlando

texts.es:
El socio Carlos Orlando se dedica al negocio de alquiler de habitaciones, el socio alquila a diferentes personas, el socio por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a su familia. El socio solicita el crédito para comprar pinturas para que haga pintar las habitaciones.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Carlos Orlando rents rooms. He rents to various people, and by means of this business supports his family. 

He is requesting the loan to buy paints so that he can have the rooms painted.

The member is happy to receive the loan, and promises to make his installment payments.

loans.use: to buy paint for so that he can have the rooms painted.

loans.name: Avenida Costanera Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Avenida Costanera  está en su ciclo número 2º del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde una de las integrantes es la Sra. Florentina.
Entre el trabajo que ella hace cuenta que es peluquera y que también hace termos forrados y luego los vende, ella es una mujer muy sacrificada, que con mucho esmero y esfuerzo está ayudando a su familia para que no les falte nada.
La Sra. Florentina solicita  este préstamo para la compra  de artículos de peluquería y materias primas para los forrados de termos, y de esa forma poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
The group called "Avenida Costanera" is in their 2nd loan cycle with the Woman's Committee program where everyone works and helps each other to get ahead. They are participating in the Poverty Stoplight survey.

Florentina is one of the members. Amongst the work that she does is hairdressing and also she makes thermos covers which she later sells. She is a very self-sacrificing woman who with much determination and effort is helping her family so they don't lack anything.

Florentina is requesting a loan to buy hairdressing supplies and raw materials for her thermos covers and in this way she can continue with her work as she has been doing.

loans.use: to buy hairdressing supplies and raw materials for thermos covers.

loans.name: Maria Maritza

texts.es:
Maria Maritza tiene 29 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive con su hijo y su familia en el distrito de Oyotún, ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte del Perú. La vida en el el distrito es tranquila, la población se dedica principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Maria se dedica a la venta de ropa, en su mismo domicilio, hace aproximadamente 5 años en el rubro con muy buenas referencias personales y crediticias. Solicita el prestamo para compra de mercaderia para su negocio como pantalones, zapatos, vestidos, casacas segun la temporada, de esta manera generar mayor volumen de ventas, aumentando su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria Maritza is 29 years old, a single mother, and lives with her child and her family in Oyotún district, located in Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on Peru's north coast. Life in the district is quiet and the people who live there mainly engage in agriculture, livestock-raising and run small businesses. 

Maria sells clothing from her home. She has been doing this type of work for approximately five years and has very good personal and credit references. 

She is requesting the loan to purchase merchandise for her business, such as pants, shoes, dresses, suits; according to the season. In this way she hopes to generate greater sales volume, increasing her level of income, and thereby improving her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Emilio

texts.es:
Emilio tiene 37 años, es conviviente. Vive en casa familiar con conyuge e hija. Vive en una comunidad habitada por gente amable y respetuosa, que se dedicadan a la agricultura y ganaderia; y está ubicada en el distrito de Pacanga, provincia de Chepén, región La Libertad, costa norte de Perú.

Emilio se dedica a la cría y venta de animales, como cuyes y cerdos, desde hace tres años. Además también se dedica a prestar servicio como maestro en construcción, por zona de residencia y alrededores, desde hace más de 10 años aproximadamente. Su negocio está ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio. Necesita préstamo para invertir en compra de tablas, andamios y otros, los cuales le servirán para poder trabajar en obras mas grandes, y a la vez podrá alquilarlas; y de esta forma podrá captar a un número mayor de clientes, mejores ganancias y por ende una mejora en su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Emilio is 37 years old and is in a relationship. He lives in the family house with his spouse and daughter. He lives in a community inhabited by friendly and respectful people who work in agriculture and raising livestock. It is located in the district of Pacanga, Chepén province, La Libertad region on the North Coast of Peru.

Emilio has worked raising and selling animals like guinea pigs and pigs for the past three years. He also been offering his services as a master builder in his community and it's surrroundings for more than 10 years. His business is located at the back of his house.

He needs a loan to invest in planks, scaffolding and others. This will serve him to work on bigger projects and perhaps he can rent them out. In this way he can gain a greater number of clients, greater profits and in the end improve his quality of living and that of his family.

loans.use: to invest in planks, scaffolding and others.

loans.name: Iris Estela

texts.es:
Iris, de 34 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, sus padres le enseñaron las actividades de la ganadería y la agricultura; está acompañada y junto a su esposo siembra maíz y cuida de las vacas que poseen.

Iris, se dedica a trabajar en las parcelas que alquila junto a su esposo durante la mañana y en el transcurso del día se dedican a ordeñar las vacas, para vender la leche en los alrededores de su comunidad. 

Iris, necesita el crédito para comprar otra vaca, para producir más leche y poder empezar a elaborar lácteos, esto le ayudara a poder iniciar un nuevo negocio de elaboración de pan, que le ayudara a incrementar sus ingresos.

Iris, sueña con adquirir un terreno, en donde puedan pastar sus animales y donde pueda sembrar granos básicos.
texts.en:
Iris, 34 years old, studied until high school. Her parents taught her about the livestock and agriculture businesses. She is married and with her husband she plants corn and cares for the cows that they have.

Iris works on the plots that she rents with her husband in the morning and in the course of the day they work milking the cows to sell milk in the surrounding areas of their community.

Iris needs the loan to buy another cow, to produce more milk, and to be able to begin making dairy products. This will help her to be able to start a new business making bread, which will help them to increase their income.

Iris dreams of acquiring land where they can graze their animals and plant staple grains.

loans.use: to buy another cow, to produce more milk, and to be able to begin making dairy products.

loans.name: Heliodoro

texts.es:
Heliodoro tiene 60 años de edad, es un caficultor del norte del país, es un padre y esposo comprometido con su familia. Posee una finca de 10 hectáreas, de las cuales 1.4 son de café. 

En el ciclo anterior, su producción se vio afectada por diversas plagas que atacaron la producción agrícola de su finca. Este año ha decidido implementar un plan de mantenimiento que le ayude a mejorar la condición nutricional de sus cafetos, para lo cual está solicitando un financiamiento para la compra de insumos agrícolas, y lograr así una mejor cosecha y mayores ingresos para su familia.

Para este productor, la mayor herencia que puede dejar a sus hijos, es el amor al trabajo y a la caficultura, el cual ha sido un cultivo al que su familia, por diferentes generaciones, se ha dedicado, y que él ahora maneja bajo criterios de certificación como comercio justo.
texts.en:
Heliodoro is 60 years old. He is a coffee grower from the north of the country. He is a father and husband dedicated to his family. He has a farm of 10 hectares, of which 1.4 are in coffee.

In the previous season, his production was affected by various pests that attacked the agricultural production of his farm. This year he has decided to use a maintenance plan that helps him to improve the nutritional condition of his coffee plants, for which he is applying for financing for the purchase of agricultural supplies, to thus achieve a better harvest and greater income for his family.

For this producer, the greatest inheritance that he can leave to his children is the love of work and of coffee raising, which has been a crop that his family has been dedicated to for various generations and which he now manages under fair trade certification criteria.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies that he will apply to his coffee plantation

loans.name: Irving David

texts.es:
Irving es un pequeño caficultor del norte de Nicaragua. Cuenta con aproximadamente 3 hectáreas de café en una zona rural alejada del casco urbano, la cual atiende junto a su esposa. Antes trabajaba como obrero en diferentes fincas, logrando adquirir su pequeña parcela la cual maneja desde hace 4 años. 

Con la afectación de la roya sus cafetos se vieron afectados, por lo que para mejorar la condición de su plantación, este año está solicitando un financiamiento para la compra de los insumos que requiere su cafetal y mejorar la nutrición de sus plantas para alcanzar una buena cosecha, y con ello mayores ingresos para continuar mejorando las condiciones de su familia.
texts.en:
Irving is a small coffee grower from northern Nicaragua. He has approximately 3 hectares of coffee in a rural area far from the city, and he tends it alongside his wife. Previously he worked on various farms, and 4 years ago he was able to get his own small plot of land. 

Coffee rust has affected his coffee plants. In order to improve the condition of his plantation, this year he is requesting financing to buy the supplies he needs to improve plant nutrition and secure a good harvest. This will bring better income to continue improving his family's life.

loans.use: to buy supplies needed for his coffee plantation and ensure a good harvest

loans.name: Rosa Lidia

texts.es: Rosa es una mujer trabajadora de 28 años de edad, que todos los días busca la manera de sacar adelante a su familia apoyada en su pequeña venta de productos básicos, actividad que realiza desde hace 5 años, por lo que cuenta con muchos clientes que solicitan sus productos. Rosa vive en casa de su propiedad al lado de su compañero de vida y su pequeña hija de 3 años de edad a la que logra cuidar y darle o mejor gracias a su negocio. Rosa desea surtir más su mercadería ya que actualmente no cuenta con mucha variedad de productos, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lácteos, granos básicos, entre otros productos para mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
Rosa is a hard-working woman of 28, who every day looks for a way to raise her family, supported by her little store with basic products. She has had this business for 5 years, and so she has many customers who seek her products. 

Rosa lives in a house of her own, along with her life companion and their little three-year-old daughter, whom she manages to care for and give the best, thanks to her business. 

Rosa wants to stock more merchandise, since now she doesn't have much variety of products. For this reason, she is applying to FUSAI for a loan to invest in dairy products and basic grains, among other products, in order to improve her business.

loans.use: to invest in dairy products and basic grains, among other products, in order to improve her business.

loans.name: Zangi

texts.en:
Zangi is a Babban Gona maize farmer from Gwanki Village. Zangi joined Babban Gona to create a better life for his children. In the past, Zangi suffered from poor yields that crippled his ability to pay for his children's school fees.

Through Babban Gona’s input loan, Zangi will have access to the best farm inputs in the market such as fertilizers, herbicides and improved seeds that will help him earn yields of up to 30 bags of maize/ hectare, double the Nigerian national average of 14 bags. This will see him increase his household income considerably. Thanks to Babban Gona's support, Zangi now has the opportunity to increase his yields and income and use his additional earnings to acquire more land to put into the Babban Gona program.

loans.use: to purchase improved farm inputs that will increase his yields.

loans.name: Alegria Group

texts.es:
SOILA ELIZABETH tiene 46 años de edad, es casada tiene un hijo menor de 5 años de edad. Ella es socia del grupo "Alegría" que está formado por cinco integrantes, todos muy trabajadores y responsables.
Soila Elizabeth, trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de comida rápida desde hace 3 años aproximadamente, en un pequeño ambiente de su casa ofrece a sus clientes, sus famosos pollos broaster, hamburguesas, salchipapas, así como también para complementar ofrece bebidas gaseosas.
El prestamo recibido lo invertirá en la compra de insumos para la preparación de la comida que vende en su negocio.
texts.en:
Soila Elizabeth is 46 years old. She is married and has a young five-year-old son. She is a member of the group "Alegría" (happiness), which is formed by five members, all very hard-working and responsible.

Solia Elizabeth has worked in her little business of selling fast food for approximately three years. In a little room in her house she offers her customers her famous broasted chicken, hamburgers, and salchipapas [a typical Peruvian street food containing sausages and french fries], as well as soft drinks to complement the food.

She will invest the loan received in the purchase of supplies for the preparation of the food that she sells in her business.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of supplies for the preparation of food to sell

loans.name: Anival

texts.es:
Anival tiene 43 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rústico , con su conyuge sin hijos a su cargo. Vive 20 años en el mencionado caserio, en la parte rural del distrito de San Felipe, provincia de Jaén, Region Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

La actividad a la que se dedica es carpinteria metálica, fabricación de puertas de metal, escaleras, ventanas entre otros, cuenta con 7 años de experiencia en el rubro, los trabajos los realiza en su mismo caserio y caserios aledaños, con buenas referencias personales y laborales. El destino del crédito sera para invertir en compra de materia prima como fierro,ángulos entre otros, con ello le generara mayores ingresos y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Anival is 43 years old and lives in his own home made of rustic material with his wife, without children in his care. He has lived for 20 years in a small village, in the rural part of the San Felipe district, Jaén province, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru.

He works in metal carpentry, the fabrication of metal doors, stairs, and windows, among other things. He has 7 years of experience in the field. He carries out his work in the same small village and other neighboring small villages, with good personal and work references. The loan will be used to invest in buying raw materials such as iron, angles, and other things. With that, he will generate better income and in that way be able to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in buying raw materials such as iron and angles, among other things.

loans.name: Aml

texts.en: Aml is 29, married and has two daughters and a son. Her husband works in pre-painting preparations and is the only source of income for the family. Aml started a small fattening project since she has good experience in this kind of project. She is requesting 4,000 EGP to buy a head of cattle to expand her project and help her husband with the family income.

loans.use: to buy a head of cattle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in basic grains and vegetables to stock her business and fill orders.

loans.name: José Alejandro

texts.es:
José es un pequeño cafetalero de la zona norte de Nicaragua. Por mucho tiempo trabajo como jornalero en varias fincas, pero desde hace 1 año cuenta con su pequeña parcela de 1.44 hectáreas de café, la cual maneja bajo los criterios de certificación de comercio justo.

Con el apoyo técnico de la asociación a la cual está afiliado, ha creado un plan de manejo nutricional para su cafetal, por lo que requiere el financiamiento para comprar los insumos agrícolas que le permitan tener una buena producción este año, y con ello mejorar económicamente las condiciones de su familia.

Su meta es continuar mejorando su pequeña finca y ampliando sus áreas de café, para seguir creciendo y generando oportunidades para su familia.
texts.en:
José is a small coffee grower in the northern zone of Nicaragua. For a long time he worked as a day laborer at various plantations, but since one year ago he has had a small parcel of 1.44 hectares of coffee, which he manages under fair trade certification requirements.

With the technical help of the association that he is affiliated with, he has created a nutrition management plan for his coffee plantation, for which he requires financing to buy the agricultural supplies that will permit him to have a good production this year, and with that improve his family's economic conditions.

His goal is to continue improving his small plantation and expanding his area of coffee, to continue growing and generating opportunities for his family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies that he will apply to his coffee plantation.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en: Ali is 22, single, and takes care of his aging father. He used to work as a farmer but the income from his job was very low so he started a small fattening project because he has some experience in dealing with animals. He is requesting a 5,000 EGP loan to buy a head of cattle and generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy a head of cattle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in wholesale corn to improve her income and satisfy the demand for her product.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in dairy products, basic grains, detergents, etc., and in this way restock her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stocks of sodas for sale.

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es:
José Manuel tiene 64 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el Caserío El Chingue, una zona rural del distrito de Pucará, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

José Manuel se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de arroz, ubicado en el Caserio Chingue - Pucara, con buenas referencias personales y laborales, además brinda servicio de transporte público en su propia mototaxi, trasladando a sus pasajeros a caseríos aledaños a su comunidad, ocasionalmente brinda servicios agrícolas mediante el arado con su yunta. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de fertilizantes para dar mantenimiento a su cultivo de arroz y de esta manera seguir brindando su producto, esto le generará mayores ingresos que van a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
José Manuel is 64 years old and lives with his wife and children in the small village of El Chingue, a rural zone in the Pucará district. Its population works in agriculture, business, and livestock, located in the Jaén province, which belongs to the Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru.

José Manuel works in agriculture, specifically growing rice, located in the small village of Chingue - Pucara. He has good personal and work references. He also provides public transportation service in his own motorcycle taxi, transferring his passengers to neighboring villages of his community. Occasionally he provides agricultural services through plowing with his yoke.

He has requested a loan to buy fertilizers to maintain his rice crop and in this way continue providing his product. This will generate greater income that will improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to maintain his rice crop.

loans.name: Martina

texts.es: Martina trabaja en su abastecedor en el cual vende diversos artículos a sus clientes. Ella solicita un préstamo de quinientos mil colones (₡ 500 000), para la compra de mercadería, esto con el propósito de expandir su negocio y aumentar los ingresos de su familia.
texts.en:
Martina works in her store, where she sells various items to her customers.

She is applying for a loan of 500,000 colones for the purchase of merchandise, with the goal of expanding her business and increasing the income of her family.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Kapkatet Umoja Women Group

texts.en:
The lady raising her hand in the photo is Grace, a member of Kapkatet Umoja women's group in Nakuru. She is 47 years old, married and blessed with three children. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in September 2014.

Grace does maize and bean farming, and she also rears poultry. With the training she got from Hand in Hand Eastern Africa, she has been able to run her enterprise better and profitably, unlike before. She is borrowing a Kiva loan to purchase farm inputs such as seeds, fertilizers and poultry feeds. This will increase her farm production and meet the demand for cereals and chicken meat in the market. She looks forward to more income, which will go a long way in supporting her family's basic needs and medical care.

She is grateful to Kiva and their lenders and promises to repay promptly.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs such as seeds, fertilizers and poultry feeds. This will increase her farm production.

loans.name: Clement

texts.en:
Clement, aged forty (40) years is an engineer and has been constructing latrines for communities across the country. His company has won a contract to construct latrines in Nima, a sub town in Accra. Due to distance, there is the need to get a vehicle to make it very convenient conveying the building materials to the places where the construction will be done.

It is for this reason Clement is requesting this loan. He will use the loan to add to his saved money and purchase a tricycle for the conveyance of the materials for the construction of the latrines.

loans.use: to buy a tricycle to transport building materials for the construction of latrines.

loans.name: Clemencia

texts.es:
CLEMENCIA TIENE 36 AÑOS, SEPARADA. VIVE CON SUS 4 HIJOS EN CASA PROPIA DESDE HACE MAS DE 20 AÑOS, EN UNA COMUNIDAD DEDICADA AL COMERCIO, AGRICULTURA Y GANADERIA, CONOCIDA COMO EX COOPERATIVA CAYALTI, PROVINCIA DE CHICLAYO,REGION LAMBAYEQUE, COSTA NORTE DE PERU.

CLEMENCIA SE DEDICA A PRESTAR SERVICIO COMO RECICLADORA DE PLASTICO DURO Y BOTELLAS PLASTICAS, CON BUENAS REFERECNIAS PERSONALES Y LABORALES, CON EL CRÉDITO COMPRARA MAS MERCADERIA Y FORTALECERA EL MISMO. EL CREDITO A OTORGARLE LE FACILITARA SEGUIR TRABAJANDO Y DE ESA MANERA SEGUIR OBTENIENDO SUS PROPIOS INGRESOS, Y MEJORAR SU CALIDAD DE VIDA.
texts.en:
Clemencia is 36 years old, separated. She has been living with her 4 children in her own house for more than 20 years. She lives in a community dedicated to commerce, agriculture, and cattle breeding, which is known as Ex-cooperativa Cayalti, Chiclayo Province, Lambayeque region, in the Northern Coast of Peru.

Clemencia works in recycling of hard plastic and plastic bottles. With the loan and great personal and work references, she will buy more merchandise and strengthen her business. The loan granted will help her to continue working. This way she can keep earning her own income and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to grow her business

loans.name: Esmeralda

texts.en:
This is Esmeralda, a 36-year-old, ethnic Egyptian Albanian. She is divorced and the mother of an 18-year-old child. She lives with her elderly parents and her son in very poor conditions. She is seeking your compassion to help her financially so that she can make some basic repairs to the little home where they've been residing for years.

Esmeralda works as a seamstress in a clothing factory, located in the city of Korca where her family lives. She receives monthly pay of $220 and her parents' retirement pension is approximately $350. Kindly note that almost everyone in the Egyptian community is blessed with some musical talents, and being very handy people they do well in almost all kinds of trades except construction. Added to this, they are a very peaceful people, according to the national information.

loans.use: to make some basic repairs to her poorly-built home.

loans.name: Clemencia

texts.en:
Clemencia is 72 years old and widowed with five children. Clemencia works very hard to provide for them.

Clemencia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items, like candies, biscuits, cooking oil, noodles, toothpaste, coffee, etc., to sell.

Clemencia has been in this business for 50 years and sells a variety of items such as candies, biscuits, cooking oil, noodles, toothpaste, coffee, etc.

In the future, Clemencia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional items, like candies, biscuits, cooking oil, noodles, toothpaste, coffee, etc., to sell.

loans.name: Lami

texts.en:
Lami is a Babban Gona farmer from Kusa Village. She joined Babban Gona so that she could realize better yields on her farm. Since joining Babban Gona, Lami no longer has to worry about having inadequate income to increase her farmland.

Through Babban Gona’s input loan she will have access to top of the range farm inputs such as fertilizers, herbicides and improved seeds that will help her earn yields of up to 30 bags of maize per hectare, double the national average in Nigeria. This will see her increase her income considerably. This season Lami has ambitious plans to harvest 50 bags of maize. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support, Lami now has the opportunity to provide employment to members of her community through her farm.

loans.use: to purchase improved farm inputs that will increase her yields.

loans.name: Xiomy Estefany

texts.es:
XIOMY ESTEFANY, tiene 20 años de edad. Ella es estudiante de la carrera de Administración de Empresas, ella está muy entusiasmada con sus estudios quiere cumplir su sueño que es poder tener su propia empresa, gracias al apoyo recibido mediante los préstamos ella ha podido avanzar con sus estudios, realizándolos con tranquilidad y sin preocupaciones sobre todo en el aspecto económico.
Para su carrera es importante el conocimiento de diversos idiomas, por lo que tomará un curso de francés  paralelo a sus estudios de administración.
El préstamo reicbido lo invertirá en el pago del curso de francés.
texts.en:
Xiomy Estefany is 20 years old. She is a student with a major in Business Administration. She is very enthusiastic about her studies, and wants to achieve her dream which is to have her own company. Thanks to the support she received from the loans, she has been able to advance with her studies with peace and without much worries, especially about the economic aspects.

Knowing diverse languages is important for her major. For this, she will take a course in French in parallel to her studies of Administration.

She will invest the loan to pay for her French courses.

loans.use: PAGARÁ EL CURSO DE FRANCÉS PARA COMPLEMENTAR SUS ESTUDIOS DE ADMINISTRACIÓN

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more books and educational materials for the children at her two schools.

loans.name: Hamila

texts.en:
Hamila is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Hamila is 30 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

Hamila has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Hamila requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish to sell to her customers.

Hamila has been in this business for one year. In the future, Hamila would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell to her customers

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is the name of the lady appearing in the photo. She is 30 years old and a single mother of four.

Grace gained a lot of knowledge on enterprise management through the training she received from Hand in Hand Eastern Africa. She is a maize, beans and vegetable farmer, a business that she has been running for 7 years. She produces enough for her family and sells the rest. She is borrowing a Kiva loan to boost her vegetable business by buying more stock from her neighbors to help increase sales. This will lead to more income, thus allowing her to cater to family needs, such as food, with ease.

Grace is grateful for Kiva and their lenders and promises to repay promptly.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables, which will help boost sales, leading to more income.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
La socia Ana Maria se dedica al negocio de venta de mochilas,la socia por medio de este negocio quiere sacara adelante a su familia,el soueño de la socia es tener otra tienda donde pueda vender las mochilas,la socia es una mujer muy trabajadora.La socia solicita le credito para comprar mochilas.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Ana Maria works in the business of selling knapsacks. Through this business, she wants to get ahead with her family. Her dream is to have a shop where she can sell the knapsacks. She is a very hard-working woman. 

Ana Maria is requesting a loan to buy knapsacks. She is pleased with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy kanpsacks

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy eggs, cornmeal, and disposable diapers.

loans.name: Uwani

texts.en:
Uwani is a Babban Gona farmer from Gayya Village. She joined Babban Gona so that she could realize better yields on her farm. Since joining Babban Gona, Uwani no longer has to worry about having inadequate income to increase her farmland. Through Babban Gona’s input loan she will have access to top-of-the-range farm inputs, such as fertilizers, herbicides and improved seeds that will help her earn yields of up to 30 bags of maize/ hectare, double the national average in Nigeria. This will see increase her income considerably.

This season Uwani has ambitious plans to harvest 10 bags of maize. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support, Uwani now has the opportunity to build a house/ renovate her house.

loans.use: to purchase improved farm inputs that will increase her yields.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy is 41 years old, married and blessed with three children. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in the year 2013 so as to benefit from the training, especially enterprise development.

She operates a cereals store where she sells foodstuffs such as rice, maize, beans, green gram, sorghum and soya beans. She is borrowing a Kiva loan to buy more cereals, hence addding stock to increase her income, enabling her to continue supporting her child's education.

She is grateful to Kiva and their lenders for the financial support. She promises to repay promptly.

loans.use: to buy more cereals, hence adding stock to increase her income and continue supporting her child's education.

loans.name: Liza

texts.es:
Liza tiene 20 años y estudia la carrera de ciencias sociales está en el segundo año y le falta dos años para poder recibirse, en la actualidad está trabajando en un taller de costura y de esa forma se gana los medios para poder cubrir sus estudios.
Ella pide este préstamo ya que tiene la necesidad de cubrir las cuotas de su universidad. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe.
texts.en:
Liza is 20 years old and studies Social Sciences. She is in her second year and has two years remaining until graduation. Currently she is working at a sewing studio, by which she earns the means to cover the costs of her studies.

She is requesting this loan for the need to cover the costs of her university. She is grateful for the opportunity she receives.

loans.use: to pay for university tuition

loans.name: Samson

texts.en:
Samson is a Babban Gona farmer from Gayya Village. He joined Babban Gona so that he could realize better yields on his farm. Since joining Babban Gona, Samson no longer has to worry about having inadequate income to purchase better inputs to improve his yield. Through Babban Gona’s input loan he will have access to top-of-the-range farm inputs, such as fertilizers, herbicides and improved seeds, that will help him earn yields of up to 30 bags of maize/ hectare, double the national average in Nigeria. This will see increase him increase his income considerably.

This season Samson has ambitious plans to harvest 10 bags of maize. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support, Samson now has the opportunity to move into a better home with his family.

loans.use: to purchase improved farm inputs that will increase his yields.

loans.name: Kawthar

texts.en:
Kawthar is 23, single, has 4 siblings and lives with her parents. Her father is a farmer and he is the only breadwinner of the family. However the income from farming is very low.

She decided to start a small grocery store project to help her father with cover the family's basic needs. She is requesting a 5000 EGP loan to buy grocery products such as oil, cheese and pasta to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy some grocery products such as oil, cheese and pasta.

loans.name: Wendy Maryorie

texts.es: Wendy de 18 años de edad,  soltera y sin hijos, es una excelente estudiante de la facultad de arquitectura que estudia mucho para alcanzar sus metas en la vida. Con la ayuda de sus padres, Wendy  con mucha dedicación a sus  estudios está logrando un buen record de notas y así poder ser una buena arquitecta.  Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá  para el pago de la matricula,  pensión y la compra de sus materiales que necesite. Wendy   se encuentra muy agradecida  por la ayuda brindada y se despide con muchos deseos de culminar sus metas propuestas agradece a Kiva y Edaprospo.
texts.en:
Wendy is 18 years old, and she is single and has no children. She is an excellent student at the architecture school, and she studies a lot in order to reach her goals in life. With the help of her parents, and with a lot of dedication from Wendy towards her studies, she is achieving good grades so she can be a good architect.

With the loan she has requested, she will pay for tuition, housing expenses, and the materials that she needs. Wendy is very grateful for the help she is given, and she goes on with many desires to reach her proposed goals, and thanks Kiva and Edaprospo.

loans.use: to pay for tuition and housing expenses.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.pt:
O Sr Carlos é casado, pai de 4 filhos e todos vão a escola, trabalha como motorista numa empresa de segurança  e tambem tem um negocio. É com este negocio que consegue aumentar a renda familiar que não é coberto pelo salario,faz esse negocio ja a bastante tempo juntamente com a esposa num regime ambulatorio, seus clientes são na maioria mulheres. Sua mercadoria busca na Africa do Sul e entrega aos seus clientes, colectando o dinheiro sempre no fim do mês, confessa que é desta maneira que consegue sustentar sua familia.
Para satisfazer a procura dos seus serviços por parte da clientela o sr Carlos pediu o terceiro emprestimo na hluvuku para comprar talheres,ferro de engomar,lencois e mantas.O seu maior sonho é concluir a obra da sua casa
texts.en:
Carlos is married with four children, all of whom are in school. He works as a driver for an security company and also runs his own sales business. With this business he is able to bring in enough extra money each month to cover what his salary does not. Carlos and his wife have been working together for quite some time selling items door to door, mostly to women.

Carlos goes to South Africa in order to buy his merchandise which he later delivers to his customers. He then collects payment from them at the end of each month.Carlos says that this is the way he is able to keep his family afloat financially.

Carlos is asking for his third loan from Hluvuku [Kiva Field Partner] in order to satisfy his customers' needs. He plans to buy tableware, irons, sheets, and blankets. His main goal for the future is to finish construction of his house.

loans.use: to buy tableware, irons, sheets, and blankets

loans.name: Anabel

texts.es:
Anabel vive con sus padres en la ciudad de Itá. es la menor de de tres hermanos, su padre es chofer de ómnibus de larga distancia y su madre es docente, y por medio de sus oficios han luchado para que Anabel pueda ser alguien en la vida.
Ella está estudiando la carrera de ingeniería comercial, para poder ser alguien en la vida y poder ayudar a sus seres queridos. Su meta es terminar su carrera y poder ayudarle económicamente a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y así continuar con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Anabel lives with her parents in the city of Itá. She is the smallest of three siblings. Her father is a driver of long distance omnibuses, and her mother is a teacher. Through the means of their jobs, her parents have fought to have Anabel become someone in life.

Anabel studies Commercial Engineering, in order to become someone in life and to be able to help her loved ones. Her goal is to finish her major and to be able to support her family economically.

She is requesting this loan to pay of the costs of her courses and in this way continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay for her university costs

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en: Samuel is a single man. He describes himself to be honest. He operates a deejaying business. He has been involved in this business for three years. His business is located in a busy area and his primary customers are locals. He describes his biggest business challenge to be insufficient capital. He will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy deejaying equipment. His business goal is to expand his business within five years. This is his first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: buy deejaying equipment

loans.name: Eunice

texts.en: Eunice is an intelligent and very resourceful 51-year-old smallholder farmer. She has defied the notion among her friends that farming is an old-fashioned way of earning a living. Her primary sources of income are milk and planting different varieties of crops. Eunice hails from Chuka, Kenya, an area that enjoys favorable weather patterns that boost crop production. Eunice wants to diversify and start dairy goat farming. The Chuka area has a ready market for goat meat and skin, hence she will not have a need to go and look for a market. Being a hardworking mother, Eunice has always ensured that she puts food on the table for her family. She also ensures she is able to take her children to school. Eunice detests living in conditions of poverty and she has a plan to improve her standard of living. This is why she is seeking the loan. Eunice is very comfortable with the repayment plan and the monthly installments. You can help Eunice with a loan so she can fulfill all her dreams.

loans.use: to buy a dairy goat.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a 47-year-old smallhold farmer. She is one of those smiling, optimist people who wake up every day at 5 o’clock with a smile drawn on her face, ready to get her partner and children ready for the day. Ten years ago, Mary decided to start farming. Her husband was supportive, and he even allowed her to use their land as capital. 

Today, she has achieved great milestones in terms of diversifying from vegetable farming by introducing farm animals such as dairy cows and hens. She also does a side hustle business to supplement the meager income she earns from farming. However, a large portion of the land is still dedicated to maize farming. 

Mary is seeking a loan from Kiva lenders to purchase farm implements. After years of use, her farm tools have become old and worn out. This makes Mary’s work on the farm very slow and tedious. With your loan, she will be able to acquire new farm implements that are in good condition, better designed, durable, and more efficient. The overall effect will be a better quality of farm work and better yields at the end of the season.

Her biggest dream is to become a large-scale farmer, which she believes she can achieve slowly with the help of Kiva and Juhudi, which is a field partner.

loans.use: to buy farm implements.

loans.name: Domingos

texts.pt:
O Sr Domingos é militar de profissão,casado é pai de 4 filhos todos vão a escola. Tem um agregado familiar grande e vive numa casa pequena,esta situação levou o a começar com uma obra de dependencia para os filhos de foma a garantir uma boa acomodação para sua familia.
Uma vez que o salario não é suficiente para dar continuidade com as obras e sentiu a necessidade de solicitar um emprestimo para comprar chapas de zinco e um portão para o murro. É cliente da hluvuku ja a bastante tempo por isso conta que o seu maior sonho é continuar a benefeciar se dos emprestimos para no futuro poder comprar uma camioneta para garantir melhor vida da sua familia pôs a reforma.
texts.en:
Domingos works in the military and is married with four children, all of whom are in school. Because he has a large family and lives in a small house he decided to expand the family's living space to make room for all his children.

Because Domingos has been unable to make much progress with construction using only his salary, he felt it was necessary to take out a loan to buy zinc plates and a gate for one of the walls on his property. Domingos has worked with Hluvuku [Kiva Field Partner] for some time and he would like to have opportunities to take out more loans in the future, so that he can buy a truck that will help guarantee a better life for his family after the construction is finished.

loans.use: to buy zinc plates and a gate for his wall.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es:
Fernando continua esforzándose para poder ser un buen perito, y el día de mañana poder ofrecer un buen servicio a las personas que necesiten de el y sus conocimientos. Comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en poder pagar sus cuotas y gastos de transporte, lo cual le fue de mucha ayuda para poder continuar.
Él pide este nuevo préstamo para poder pagar nuevamente las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en: Fernando continues to work hard to become a good professional, and in the future to offer a good service to people that may need his help. He stated that his last loan was used to pay his college tuition and transportation costs, which was a great help to continue studying. He is asking for a new loan to continue paying his college tuition, and this way, to continue his studies as he has been doing.

loans.use: To pay for college tuition.

loans.name: Dennis

texts.en:
Dennis, 29 years old, is married and supports one child. He is a hardworking, small scale farmer. He has applied for his first loan of KES.25,000 from Visionfund Kenya to buy a dairy cow so as to boost his dairy farming activity.

He plans to use the gained profits to repay his loan and improve his family's living standards.He hopes to run a financially stable life.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow so as to boost his dairy farming.

loans.name: Leslie Tatiana

texts.es: Leslie  de 23 años de edad,  soltera y sin hijos, es una agradable estudiante de la facultad de Obstetricia, estudia mucho para alcanzar sus metas en la vida. Leslie  tiene la meta de culminar sus estudios con éxitos y poder ser una buena Obstetra.  Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá  para el pago de sus pensiones universitarias. Leslie  se encuentra muy agradecida  por la ayuda brindada y se despide con muchos deseos de culminar sus metas propuestas agradece a  kiva y Edaprospo por la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en:
Leslie is 23 years old, single, and has no children. She is a pleasant student in the school of obstetrics. She studies a lot in order to reach her goals in life. Leslie has the goal of finishing her studies with success and becoming a good obstetrician.

With the requested loan she will pay for her university housing. Leslie is very grateful for the help she has received, and she goes on with many desires to reach her proposed goals. She thanks Kiva and Edaprospo for this provided opportunity.

loans.use: to pay for her university housing.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es:
Angela, de 49 de edad, no estudio, está acompañada, el se dedica a la albañilería, tienen dos hijos de once y cinco años de edad.

Angela, tiene un negocio de antojitos de pasteles, riguas y nuégados desde hace 15 años, aprendió este trabajo debido a la necesidad de darles todo lo necesario y apoyar al padre de sus hijos, el negocio está a diez minutos de su casa.
 
El préstamo lo solicita para comprar insumos y comprar frutas como: guineos, manzanas, papayas, piña etc, de esa forma tendrá otros ingresos y de esa forma logrará que su vida y la de su familia sea mejor.

El sueño de Angela, es mantener su negocio y que sus dos hijos vivan en mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Angela is 49 years old, she didn't study and has a partner. He is a bricklayer, they have two children ages 11 and 5 years old. For the past 15 years, Angela has had a business selling pastries, riguas, and fried dumplings (nuegados.) She learned this job because she needed to support her family and her children's father. The business is located 10 minutes from her house. She is asking for a loan to buy ingredients and fruits such as: bananas, apples, papayas, pineapple, etc. This way she will have other income an will be able to make her life and her family's life better. Angela's dream is to keep her business and to help her two children have a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy ingredients and fruits such as bananas, apples, papayas, pineapple, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy zinc plates, cement, and doors in order to continue with a home construction project.

loans.name: Graciete

texts.pt: O Senhora Graciete vive maritalimente com seu esposo e 4 filhos  e 3 filhos é que vão  a escola,o marido é um pedreiro e não tem emprego fixo esta situação levou com que a dona Graciete iniciasse um pequeno negocio para ajudar o seu esposo nas despesa fmiliares. Ela tem em casa uma pequena baraca onde vende produtos da primeira necessidade,mas não conseguia satisfazer o mercado,havia muita procura dos seus serviços foi então que ela viu a necessidade de recorrer ao emprestimo na hluvuku para comprar amendoim,oleo de vegetal e sabão.o seu maior sonho é custear os estudos dos seus filhos.O seu maior desafio é continuar a custear os estudos dos filhos na base do negocio.
texts.en:
Graciete lives with her husband and four children, three of whom are in school. Her husband is a bricklayer who is currently unemployed. This situation led Graciete to start her own small business to help with household expenses.

Graciete has a small stand that she runs from her home where she sells everyday products, but she hasn't been able to keep up with the needs of her customers because there's been a great demand for the products she is selling. For this reason, she is asking for a loan from Hluvuku [Kiva Field Partner] in order to buy peanuts, vegetable oil, and soap.

Graciete's main goal for the future is to continue covering the cost of her children's education, and doing this with her sales money is also her greatest challenge.

loans.use: to buy peanuts, vegetable oil and soap.

loans.name: Uamsho Mpya Group

texts.fr: Kasongya est un brave commerçant, président du groupe solidaire «Uamsho Mpya», client de l’IMF Hekima, âgé de 37 ans, marié à une étudiante, père de 2 enfants scolarisés. Il est vendeur des matériels d’ustensiles de cuisine dans un magasin d’une gallérie de la ville depuis 5 ans. Il commença son business avec de fonds reçu après récolte dans son champ. Il va acheter des cuvettes, casseroles, assiettes, thermos, etc. Il souhaite accroitre son activité, construire une maison, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, il remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en:
Kasongya is a good and honest merchant and the president of the solidarity group “Uamsho Mpya”. Married to a student, he is 37 years old and the father of two children in school, and he is a client of the microfinance institution Hekima. He has been selling kitchen utensils in a gallery store in town for five years. He began his business with funds from selling the harvest from his field.

Kasongya is going to purchase some bowls, pots, pans, plates, thermos, etc. He would like to grow his business, build a house, and provide food and schooling for his children. In conclusion, he thanks Hekima for its support of unbanked entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to purchase bowls, pots, pans, plates, thermos, etc.

loans.name: Efren Del Carmen

texts.es:
Efren, de 34 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está acompañada, su pareja se dedica a la construcción, tienen una hija de cinco años de edad y viven en casa alquilada.

Efren, tiene cinco años de trabajar en una institución financiera, sus funciones son hacer la limpieza y como digitador, el horario de trabajo es de 7:00 a.m. a 4:00 de la tarde de lunes a sábado.

El préstamo lo solicita para comprar medicinas para su hija y cubrir otros gastos que tiene, el préstamo le ayudara a que su hija mejore de salud.

El sueño de Efren, es tener todo lo necesario para su hija, porque siempre tiene que estar comprando medicinas para un problema de salud que tiene.
texts.en: Efren is 34 years old, she studied through high school. She has a partner who works in construction, they have a 5 year old daughter and they live in a rental house. Efren has worked for five years for a financial institution, she is responsible for cleaning the office and dat entry. She works from 7:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. from Monday through Saturday. She is asking for a loan to buy medicines for her daughter and to cover other expenses. This loan will help her daughter improve her health. Efren's dream is to provide everything necessary for her daughter because she always has to buy medicines for a health problem she has.

loans.use: To buy medicines for her daughter and cover other expenses.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: Buy 10 cases of soft drinks and 15 pairs of shoes.

loans.name: Seybatou's Group

texts.fr:
Créer ce 17 Mai  2011 à l’occasion de son inauguration dans la place publique du village, ce banc villageois compte en son sein des femmes déterminées à entreprendre des activités génératrices de revenu et de renforcer leur capacité de financement. Actuellement à son neuvième cycle le groupement commence à comprendre le programme. Elles vivent dans un même village depuis plusieurs décennies et entretiennent des relations de solidarité et d’entre aide. Elles s’activent dans le petit commerce. 

Madame Seybatou, âgée de 47 ans (debout à l’extrême droite avec une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est mariée et mère 05 enfants Elle s’active dans la vente de sucre de riz, d’huile et de thé.

Avec son nouveau prêt, elle compte acheter du sucre du riz de l’huile  d’un montant de 100000 f pour le revendre en détails dans son village et renouveler son stock tout les mois.

Les bénéfices lui permettront d’aider ses enfants les soins médicaux et leur habillement.
texts.en:
Created May 17, 2011 at its inauguration in the village's public square, this "banc villageois" loan association regroups women determined to undertake income-generating activities and strengthen their funding capacity. Currently in its ninth round, the group is beginning to understand the program.

They have been living in the same village for several decades and maintain relationships based on solidarity and mutual aid. They are active retail merchants.

Mrs. Seybatou, (standing at the far right raising her hand), is at 47 years old the group's featured borrower. She is the married mother of five children, and is active at selling rice, sugar, culinary oil and tea.

With her new loan, she will buy 100,000 francs' worth of sugar, rice and culinary oil for retail sales in her village, and renew her stock every month.

The profits will enable her to help with her children's medical care and clothing.

loans.use: buy 100,000 francs' worth of sugar, rice and culinary oil for retail sales in her village, and renew her stock every month.

loans.name: Penda Hamidou's Group

texts.fr:
Créer ce 17 Mai  2011 à l’occasion de son inauguration dans la place publique du village, ce banc villageois compte en son sein des femmes déterminées à entreprendre des activités génératrices de revenu et de renforcer leur capacité de financement. Actuellement à son neuvième cycle le groupement commence à comprendre le programme. Elles vivent dans un même village depuis plusieurs décennies et entretiennent des relations de solidarité et d’entre aide. Elles s’activent dans le petit commerce. 

Madame Penda Hamidou, âgée de 20 ans (debout à l’extrême droite avec une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est mariée et mère 01 enfant Elle s’active dans la vente de caprins et ovins.

Avec son nouveau prêt, elle compte acheter des caprins d’un montant de 52500f et des ovins d’un montant de 25000f pour le revendre en détails.

Les bénéfices lui permettront d’aider ses enfants dans la nourriture, les soins médicaux et leur habillement.
texts.en:
Created May 17, 2011 at its inauguration in the village's public square, this "banc villageois" loan association regroups women determined to undertake income-generating activities and strengthen their funding capacity. Currently in its ninth round, the group is beginning to understand the program.

They have been living in the same village for several decades and maintain relationships based on solidarity and mutual aid. They are active retail merchants.

Mrs. Penda Hamidou, (standing at the far right raising her hand), is at 20 years old the group's featured borrower. She is the married mother of one child, and is active at selling goats and sheep.

With her new loan, she will buy buy 52,500 francs' worth of goats and 25,000 francs' worth of sheep for retail sales.

The profits will enable her to help with her children's food, medical care and clothing.

loans.use: buy 52,500 francs' worth of goats and 25,000 francs' worth of sheep for retail sales.

loans.name: Milca Marisol

texts.es: Milca es una mujer de 21 años de edad que se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catálogo, pero además buscando la manera de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia ha iniciado con la venta de ropa desde hace poco tiempo pero con muy buenos resultados. Milca vive junto a sus padres y su hermana en casa de su propiedad por lo que se siente feliz. Milca desea contar con un local en el cual distribuir sus productos de belleza e invertir en una mayor cantidad de ropa para vender en su negocio, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: pantalones, faldas, blusas, camisetas, vestidos entre otros productos. Milca solicito un crédito anteriormente con el cual construyo un muro perimetral y gracias a ello logro también construir un cuarto dormitorio, por lo que se siente muy agradecida por el apoyo recibido.
texts.en:
Milca is 21 years old and makes a living selling beauty products from a catalogue. In addition, in search of a way to improve her and her family's quality of life, Milca recently started selling clothes and has had good results with this work.

Milca lives with her parents and sister in a house owned by the family; Milca is happy about this.

Milca wants to have her own premises where she can sell her beauty products and invest in more clothes to sell at her business. She is therefore applying for a loan from FUSAI in order to invest in trousers, skirts, blouses, shirts, dresses and other products.

Milca applied for a previous loan, which she used to build a perimetre wall. Thanks to the loan, she was also able to build a bedroom. Milca is very grateful for the support that she has received.

loans.use: to invest in trousers, skirts, blouses, shirts, dresses and other products.

loans.name: Awa's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupement a été créé le 26/09/2013. Elle regroupe 15 femmes issues toutes du même village. Leur activité principal est le commerce de détail.

Notre emprunteuse en vedette qui se situe sur la photo a gauche et levant la main droite est née le 10/04/1979. Elle a 4 enfants dont 3 filles et 1 garçon. Coumba pratique le petit commerce en vendant des légumes et des beignets. 

Avec ce prêt elle compte comme a l'approche de chaque fête de tabaski acheter des moutons afin de les engraisser pour pouvoir les revendre a bon prix a la veille de cette fête.

Les bénéfices de ce prêt serviront à acheter plus de marchandises, des légumes qu'elle commercialise et de la farine pour les beignets qu'elle vend.Une autre partie des bénéfice sera épargner au niveau de caurie mf.
texts.en:
The group was established September 26, 2013. It regroups 15 women all from the same village whose main activity is retail trading.

Our featured borrower, who is on the left of the photo raising her right hand, was born on April 10, 1979. She has four children: three girls and one boy. Coumba is a small retail merchant who sells vegetables and fritters.

As with each Tabaski celebration, she will use the loan to buy sheep to fatten in order to sell them at a good price on the eve of this feast (the most important celebration of Islam).

The profits from this loan will be used to buy more merchandise: vegetables for retail sales and flour for the fritters she sells. Another part of the profits will be put into savings at the Caurie MFI..

loans.use: buy 60,000 CFA francs' worth of sheep to fatten and resell at the Tabaski celebration

loans.name: Stephanie Fabiola

texts.es:
Con tan solo 22 años de edad, Stephanie es una joven que esta por egresar de sus carrera universitaria de la carrera de  ingeniería civil, solamente le hacen falta 9 materias para terminar sus clases.
Anteriormente obtuvo su título de secundaria como bachiller en ciencias y letras, vive en compañía de un hermano y sus padres quienes actualmente le están apoyándo económicamente ya que Stephanie no esta laborando.
Su madre, es la persona directa que le apoyará en su crédito educativo, ella se desempeña como gerente de agencia en una institución bancaria del país y que con mucho esfuerzo se ha propuesto darle lo mejor a sus hijos.
Stephanie se considera una joven precavida ante las circunstancias de la vida, es muy sincera con sus seres cercanos y aun mas con sus amistades, sus padres le inculcaron el ser disciplinada, respetuosa y organizada para llevar a cabo sus responsabilidades, tiene un alto grado de compromiso para cumplir sus metas y no se rinde ante cualquier obstáculo que la vida le presente.
Su motivación es su carrera, le apasiona la ingeniería y desea desempeñarse como tal, nos comenta que su manera de poder aportar al desarrollo de su país, es ejerciendo su profesión, ya que hay muchos jóvenes con capacidades y conocimientos innovadores que hoy en día se están perdiendo, ella desea poder ser una mujer de éxito con aportes a los proyectos civiles de su país y en su familia, desea poder contribuir mediante un apoyo económico que permita mejorar las condiciones en las que hoy en día se encuentran.
A raíz de muchos percances económicos, en su familia se vio afectado el presupuesto que sus padres habían destinado para su educación, lo cual limitó su avance en el periodo académico universitario es por eso que solicitó un apoyo económico y se siente muy feliz de haber encontrado una respuesta positiva para terminar su carrera.
Como meta, Stephanie desea trabajar en una empresa que le brinde la oportunidad de desarrollar sus conocimientos, y a las vez que le permita crecer de manera profesional, posteriormente desea obtener una especialización en el extranjero.
texts.en:
CAt just 22 years old, Stephanie is a young woman who wants to graduate from her degree in civil engineering. She only has to complete nine more modules to finish her classes.

Previously Stephanie completed school with a specialisation in sciences and letters. She lives with her parents and one brother, who currently support her financially as she does not have a job.

Stephanie’s mother is the person who will support Stephanie in her educational loan. Stephanie’s mother is manager of a banking institution in Honduras and, with a lot of effort, has sought to give her children the best she can.

Stephanie is prepared for everything in life. She is very sincere with her loved ones, and even more so with friends. Her parents taught her to be disciplined, respectful and organised in order to carry out her responsibilities. Stephanie is committed to achieving her goals, and does not give in at any obstacle.

Stephanie’s motivation is her degree. She is passionate about engineering and wants to work in this profession. She says that by practising her profession, Stephanie can bring something to the development of her country. There are many young people with innovative skills and knowledge that are being lost. Stephanie wants to be a successful woman who can bring something to civil projects in her country and in her family. Stephanie wants to contribute through financial support that will allow the family to improve its current conditions.

At the root of much financial misfortune, Stephanie has been affected by the budget that her parents had set aside for her education. This limited her progression at university. Stephanie has therefore applied for a loan and is very happy to have a positive response. She can now finish her degree.

Stephanie’s goal is to work at a business that will give her the opportunity to develop her knowledge and allow her to grow as a professional. Later on, she would like to specialise in her subject abroad.

loans.use: to finish her university studies.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: Carlos es un joven que labora en su propio proyecto de ganado para producción de leche y queso. Con el propósito de aumentar las ventas de su negocio, solicita un préstamo de setecientos cincuenta mil colones (₡ 750 000) para la compra de animales que aumentarán el hato lechero en su finca.
texts.en: Carlos is a young man who works at his own cattle project where he produces milk and cheese. In order to increase sales at his business, Carlos is applying for a loan of ₡750,000 to buy animals to increase dairy cattle at his farm.

loans.use: to buy cows for milking.

loans.name: Marta Elizabeth

texts.es:
Marta, de 36 años de edad, estudio bachillerato general, está acompañada, su pareja trabaja de profesor, tienen tres hijos, una es adolescente y dos están pequeños.

Marta, vende productos de revistas, se ha dedicado a este negocio con el propósito de ayudarle un poco 
a su compañero de vida y que sus hijos tengan una mejor calidad de vida. 
 
El préstamo lo necesita para comprar pollos de engorde, porque donde su mamá tiene solo pollos indios y quiere crecerlos para venderlos a buen precio, de esa manera lograra mejorar su calidad de vida.

El sueño de Martaa, es seguir trabajando muy fuerte, para que a sus hijos no les falte nada.
texts.en:
Marta is 36 years old and completed high school. She has a partner, a teacher. The couple has three children: one is a teenager while the other two are younger.

Marta sells products from magazines. She has done this work in order to help her husband a little, and so that their children can enjoy a higher quality of life.

Marta needs this loan in order to buy chickens to fatten up. Her mother only has Indian chickens, and she wants to raise them to sell them at a good price. By doing so, Marta can improve her quality of life.

Marta's dream is to continue working very hard so that her children need for nothing.

loans.use: to buy chickens to fatten up.

loans.name: Zaema

texts.en:
Zaema is a 52-year-old single lady, who started running her father's grocery store fifteen years ago. Her father's business was established thirty years ago.
Zaema is the sole breadwinner to two other members of her family. She is well known in her region with her good reputation and hard work she puts to develop her business in order to reply to her family's living needs.
Zaema's business income is barely enough to cover her family's living expenses. Thus, she is acquiring  a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua, to pay for her mother's medical needs expenses since she is her sole breadwinner.
Saving money from her selling is very hard due to the increasing expenses she is facing. Al Majmoua's acquired loan was her only relief to admit that nothing can stop her from accomplishing what she desires easily.
She hopes that in the future she can expand her business more, and attract more customers.

loans.use: To pay for her mother's medical needs expenses since she is her sole breadwinner

loans.name: Sophal's Group

texts.en: Sophal’s group live in a rural village in Kampong Speu province in Cambodia. Sophal makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as factory laborer to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and men to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Raksmey's Group

texts.en: Raksmey’s group live in a rural village in Kampong Speu province in Cambodia. Raksmey makes a living cultivating rice and he also does extra work as factory laborer to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these woman and men to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Nusrat

texts.en:
Nusrat is a 36 years old, married woman. Her son (shown with her in the photo above) operates a construction business, which is the primary source of their income. Nusrat's son is responsible for building the roofs of houses during their construction. In this way, he is able to earn a sufficient income to provide for their family. However, in order to meet the everyday household expenditures, more income is required.

For the growth of her son's business, Nusrat has requested a loan of 40000 PKR. This will allow him to purchase good quality timber, metal and slate so he can meet his customers’ demands without any delays.

loans.use: to purchase good quality timber, metal, and slate so her son can meet his customers’ demands without any delays

loans.name: Amina

texts.en:
Amina is a married woman with three children, all of whom attend school. She lives at her own house that neither has electricity nor piped water.

She has operated a retail shop business for the past three years, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces a major challenge of transportation to her place of operation.

With the loan, she is requesting she wants to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour

loans.name: Happy

texts.en:
Happy is a married woman and staying together with her husband and two children. She owns a house that neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past two years, she has operated a charcoal selling business. She sells from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of high cost of transportation. 

With the Kshs 40,000 she wants to purchase bundles of charcoal for resale. She decided to join to Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of charcoal for resale

loans.name: Christina

texts.en: Christina is  34 years old.  She lives in Talibon, Bohol with her husband. For the last three years,  she has been selling chorizo (a Filipino-type sausage), for an income. This type of food is usually enjoyed during breakfast with rice and also barbecued during evening. This is one of the most favorite among Filipino food.  Christina would like to buy more stocks of chorizo and also stocks of Avon products so she can increase her income. In the future, she hope to engage in other business opportunities.
