Bimala dreams of having a better-supplied business and of being able to keep up with the demand of her customers so she can improve her income for the well-being of her family.

loans.use: to purchase products such as refreshments, sugar, butter, soap, rice, pasta, cheese, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase more stock such as rice, kerosene, noodles, eggs, snacks, etc.

loans.name: Jesusa

texts.en:
Jesusa is a married woman with two children aged eight and one year old. She engages in buying and selling fish. She sells to the locals in her area. Her husband earns a living from the wages he receives as a security guard. She decided to take out a loan to sustain her livelihood.

Jesusa is asking for a loan to buy fish and grocery items for family consumption. This will help her purchase more fish and provide her family with something to eat. With these, she will be able to sell more fish and her income will be augmented. She will be able to afford to buy nutritious food and a make her place better to live in.

In the future, Jesusa dreams of expanding her business and opening up a sari-sari (variety) store to make a sustainable living.

loans.use: to buy fish and grocery items for family consumption.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina is a 53-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She is a farmer who grows rice and other crops in her farm. Her husband also works as a farmer. Rosalina works hard to support her husband in meeting the needs of the family. 

In farming, she can be assured that they will not buy rice for consumption and instead they can have a good income too. The challenge is she needs to wait for the next four months so she can earn an income. She needs a loan to buy fertilizer, a sprayer tank and pesticides. 

In the future, Rosalina hope to expand her business so she can live in comfort and prosperity in her old age.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, a sprayer tank, and pesticides

loans.name: Renalie

texts.en:
Renalie is a young 20 year old woman. She is involved in farming rice, operating a tricycle business, and selling snacks in her town in Talibon, Bohol. 

Renalie is asking for a loan to continue her livelihood.  She will use the money to buy fertilizer and pay for tricycle repairs. 

Renalie hopes that she can save enough money, and eventually find a stable job in the future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay for tricycle repair

loans.name: Lezel

texts.en:
Lezel is a 31-year-old married woman from Concepcion, Iloilo. She has two sons ages 14 and 13 years old. Lezel and her husband have been involved in a fishing business for 14 years. They work together to provide the needs of their family. 

She is asking for a loan to buy a fishing net and to pay for boat repairs. In the future, Lezel wants to improve their business to help them in sending their children to college. She dreams that her children will earn a degree.

loans.use: to buy a fishing net and pay for boat repairs

loans.name: Asima

texts.en:
Asima is a 33-year-old married woman, living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan.

She requested a loan for her husband’s green grocers business. Her husband has been selling vegetables for many years. He sells seasonal fresh vegetables in his hometown. He has been using a four wheel manual cart to carry the vegetables from one place to another. Now he wants to offer seasonal fruits as well, but he does not have enough cash in hand to buy new inventory to offer his customers.

His children are growing, and their needs are increasing. To cope with the rapid increase in the cost of school fees, books, utility bills and household expenses, he wants to establish his fruit business, but he does not have enough savings to buy seasonal fruits in bulk. Therefore, Asima has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan, so that her husband can buy fresh and seasonal fruits to offer.

loans.use: to buy fresh and seasonal fruits for her husband's fruit business.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es: Durante años Edgar ofreció el servicio de vigilancia a vehículos estacionados en las afueras de supermercados, ubicados al norte de la ciudad de Barranquilla y descubrió una oportunidad de negocio al considerar que podría comercializar frutas en cosecha y CD de música y videos a los clientes que llegaran a realizar sus compras de la canasta familiar.  El sustento de su familia conformada por su cónyuge y cuatro hijos, depende de esta labor en la que ha consolidado a un gran número de clientes a quienes atiende todos los días a partir de las 8 a.m. hasta las 8 p.m.  sus compras las realiza a distribuidoras mayoristas y está aplicando a un crédito, su primer credikiva con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, que invertirá en frutas al por mayor y variedad de CD.  Esta inversión será de mucho éxito por el ahorro que obtendrá en el costo de las frutas.  Su meta a futuro es abrir un local y formalizar su negocio, así mismo terminar de remodelar su vivienda.
texts.en:
For years Edgar offered a service to take care of parked cars outside supermarkets located in the north of the city of Barranquilla, where he discovered a business opportunity by considering that he could sell seasonal fruits, music CDs and videos to the clients that arrived to purchase their goods. The sustenance of his family, composed of his wife and four children, depends on this labor in which he has consolidated a large number of customers, whom he tends to every day from 8 a.m. until 8 p.m.

He purchases his goods from wholesale distributors and is now requesting a loan, his first credikiva [loan] with the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, which he will invest in wholesale fruits and a variety of CDs. This investment will be very successful because of the price at which he will get the fruit. His future goal is to open a shop and have a formal business, as well as finishing remodelling his house.

loans.use: to invest in wholesale fruits and a variety of CDs

loans.name: Francisco

texts.pt:
O Senhor Francisco Ernesto vive na sua propria casa com sua esposa e dois filhos menores de idade e não tem mais dependentes. É policia, com o presente empréstimo ele vai adiquirir material de construção nomeadamente, uma carrada de areia grossa, pedra e cimento para dar continuidade com a construção da sua residência uma vez que ele esta a residir com a familia numa casa inacabada o que cria desconforto a familia.
O seu maior desafio é terminar de construir a residência, mobiliar a mesma, tambem sonha em fazer o ensino superior mais tem muitas dificuldades devido a natureza do seu trabalho pois trabalha em regime de  turnos.
texts.en:
Francisco Ernesto lives with his wife and two underage children in a house that he owns. He doesn't support anyone else. He's a police officer and with the current loan he'll purchase construction supplies such as a cartload of coarse sand, rocks and cement so that he can continue building his house. He currently lives with his family in an unfinished house, which inconveniences the family.
His biggest challenge is finishing the house and furnishing it. He also dreams of going to college but he struggles to do that because of his line of work, since he works by shifts.

loans.use: to purchase a cartload of coarse sand, rocks and cement so that he can continue building his house.

loans.name: Nazokat

texts.ru: Эту самостоятельную и целеустремленную женщину зовут Назокат. Назокат живет вместе с мужем и детьми. Ее муж занимается строителем. У нее есть маленькие дети. Пять года назад Назокат начала свой маленький бизнес, чтобы помочь мужу обеспечить семью. Она начала изучать профессию швеи, чтобы зарабатывать таким путем для улучшения условий жизни семьи. Назокат сейчас берет кредит, чтобы приобрести ткани и швейные принадлежности для расширения бизнеса. Это кредит поможет ей расширить деятельность и увеличить ежедневный доход. Назокат обратилась к Вам за кредитом, потому что она верит в Вас, и вы ее не подводите.
texts.en:
This independent and purposeful woman is Nazokat. She lives with her husband and children. Nazokat's husband is a builder, and Nazokat's children are little. 
Five years ago Nazokat started a small business of her own to help her husband in supporting the family. She started learning the profession of a seamstress in order to earn money for improving her family's wellbeing.  
Now Nazokat is applying for a loan to purchase fabrics and other sewing supplies for expanding her business. This loan will help her to expand her activities and improve the daily income.
Nazokat is asking you for a loan because she believes that you will not let her down.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics and other sewing supplies.

loans.name: Ericka

texts.en:
Ericka works in a restaurant kitchen helping with the dishes.  She needs a loan to close the deal of an anticretico payment (a rental agreement).  

Ericka is a single woman, but she supports her grandparents, and she will take them to live with her.  

She hopes you can help her.

loans.use: to close the deal of an anticretico payment (rent agreement)

loans.name: Haron

texts.en:
Haron is a married man. He has 4 children. He describes himself to be competent. He operates a carpentry shop where he makes furniture. He has been involved in this business for 3 years. His primary customers are locals. 

He describes his biggest business challenge to be low inventory of carpentry materials. He will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy more carpentry materials. 

He hopes that in the future, he will have a stable income. 

This is his first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more carpentry materials

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is a married man. He has 3 children. He describes himself as honest. He operates a tailoring business where he makes clothes. He has been involved in this business for 2 years. His business is located in a busy area and his primary customers are locals. 

He will use the 60,000 KES loan to buy tailoring materials. His business goal is to expand his business within 5 years. 

This is his fourth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more tailoring materials

loans.name: Sylviah

texts.en: Sylviah is a woman with experience, wisdom and a lot of patience. She believes that it’s a normal thing to have a chicken and dairy farm in Kenya, but to start a pig farm is something else entirely. Sylviah is a smallhold mixed-farmer based in Itugururu village in Chuka. She has been practicing mixed farming for the past five years. To earn a decent living, she makes income selling milk, poultry, and greens and engaging in numerous small personal businesses. Only recently, she started seeing how she could be making big money by pig farming. Raising pigs to Sylviah is something close to a hobby. She wants to sell pig meat but figures that she needs more pigs so as to make economic sense. She needs to purchase more pigs. However, her biggest challenge today is limited funds to expand. Sylviah is seeking a loan from Kiva lenders via Juhudi Kilimo to purchase pigs. Future proceeds from the commercialization of her pig farm are already committed to pay for her siblings' education. In the long run, she is confident her efforts will translate into her family having a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy pigs to raise.

loans.name: T.renganathapuram Jlg 001 Group

texts.en: Vidhya is the leader of the T.Renganathapuram Jlg 001 group. Punitha, Malarkodi, Chandra, and Kalarani are the other members of the group. Vidhya is 28 and lives with her family in Tamil Nadu. She earns her daily wages by doing manual labour on agricultural fields. She wants to supplement her income and ensure there is a more steady source of income to support her family. To this end, she underwent training from Gramalaya Microfin Foundation in making wire bags. Now, she, along with the other members in the group, are seeking a loan to start a business from home. Vidhya, Punitha and Malarkodi want to start a wire-bag making business while the other members will start home-based businesses making mixed spices. The income from the business will help them boost their income, and save more in the long run for their children's education and for any emergencies that may arise.

loans.use: To buy raw materials for her wire-bag making business.

loans.name: Warmicuna Llanqanchis Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “WARMICUNA LLANQANCHIS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Edith ella es soltera y tiene 19 años; La socia trabaja en su negocio de agricultura, la socia tiene un terreno de cultivo donde siembra maiz,papa y trigo, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de agricultura. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.
La socia que esta pegada a la foto grupal se le tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidio permiso por motivos de trabajo.
 
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de agricultura, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de animales.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank "Warmicuna Llanqanchis". This bank is located in the Anta district, in the Anta Province, in the department of Cusco.

The member Edith is 19 years old and single. She works in agriculture, and has farmland where she grows, corn, potatoes, and wheat. She works from 8:00 am until 6:00 pm. She already has a few years with this business and it is going very well. Her dream is to expand her agriculture business. She is requesting the loan to buy seeds and fertilizers.

The member in the thumbnail photo pasted to the group photo took the photo after the group meeting, and asked permission for work reasons. The other members work in: clothing sales, agriculture, grocery store, and animal sales.

She is grateful to those who are part of this dream through these means, and she is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Caudesia

texts.en:
Caudesia is a married woman. She has 2 children. She describes herself as honest. She operates a retail business where she sells clothes and handbags. She has been involved in this business for 2 years. Her business is located in a busy area and her primary customers are locals. 

She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient capital. She will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy more inventory of clothes and handbags. 

She hopes that in the future, she will have a better life. 

This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more inventory of clothes and handbags

loans.name: Robert Vencint

texts.en:
Robert Vencint is 23 years old and is engaged in buying and selling copra (dried coconut kernels, from which oil is obtained). He is a resident of Baybay, Leyte. He has two sons, ages four and two years old. 

Aside from buying and selling copra, he also sells medicines. Robert Vencint is asking for a loan to buy more medicines to sell. 

In the future, he dreams of improving his business. His ultimate goal is to raise the standard of living for his family.

loans.use: to buy medicines

loans.name: Perseveranda

texts.en:
Perseveranda is 54 years old, married, and has two children. One child is still in school.

Perseveranda is in the agricultural business, raising chickens in the Philippines. Perseveranda requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies for her business.

Perseveranda has been raising chickens for 15 years now, and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Perseveranda would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies for her business

loans.name: Luz Adiela

texts.es:
Luz es una mujer con 39 años de edad, madre de un menor, trabajadora y muy humilde, dedicada a realizar labores de campo desde muy pequeña, una actividad que aprendió gracias a las enseñanzas de su madre.
Trabaja todos los días durante 5 horas diarias.
Actualmente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo el cual lo invertirá en la compra de ganado lechero, alimento para los mismos e insumos como fertilizantes, abonos y enmiendas para mejorar la calidad de los suelos. Con esto espera aumentar sus clientes y de tal manera mejorar sus ventas. 

El sueño de esta madre es continuar trabajando para mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y poder pagarle la educación a su hijo, pues su bienestar le preocupa.

Para esto cuenta con el apoyo de Interactuar y los colaboradores  y prestamistas del portal Kiva.
texts.en:
Luz is 39 years old and mother to one son under the age of 18 years. Luz is hard-working and very humble. She has been working in the fields since she was very young, having the learned the trade from her mother.

Luz works for five hours every day.

Luz is currently applying for a loan that she will use to buy dairy cattle and feed for the cattle; and to buy supplies such as fertiliser, manure and substances to improve the quality of the soil. Luz hopes that, with this loan, she can increase her number of customers and improve her sales.

This mother's dream is to continue working in order to improve living conditions and to pay for her son's education as her health condition is worrying her.

To achieve this dream, Luz has the support of Interactuar and collaborators and lenders from Kiva.

loans.use: to buy dairy cattle and feed for the cattle; and to buy supplies such as fertiliser, manure and substances to improve the quality of the soil.

loans.name: Iva

texts.pt:
A Senhora Iva é casada, vive na casa propria com o seu esposo e com seus 3 filhos menores mas que andam na escola. Ela é comerciante e com o presente empréstimo ela vai adiquirir mercadoria para revenda nomeadamente: diversos refrigerante, bebidas e carne.
O seu maior desejo é terminar a construição da sua residência e ter uma progresso no negócio, pelo que irá amortizar o emprestimo sem entrar em mora de modo a se beneficiar dos posterior.
texts.en:
Iva is married. She lives with her husband and three children in a house that she owns. Her children are underage and still in school. She's a vendor and with the current loan she'll purchase merchandise for re-selling such as various types of soft drinks, beverages and meat.
Her biggest wish is to finish building her house and make progress in her business. That's why she will repay the loan without delinquency so that she can benefit for future loans.

loans.use: to purchase various types of soft drinks, beverages and meat.

loans.name: Mahmadsharif

texts.ru:
Это парень Махмадшариф. Он из района Руми. Ему 25 лет. Махмадшариф один из тех людей, которые не боится трудиться и всегда двигается вперед. Он серьезный, честный и трудолюбивый парень. Махмадшариф сейчас занимается выращиванием крупнорогатого скота уже 2 года. Его отец занимается таксистом. Махмадшариф пока не женат, но он планирует пожениться. 
Махмадшариф покупает молодых телят и откармливает их несколько месяцев, потом перепродает их на скотном рынке. Животноводческая деятельность является основной, потому что доход от бизнеса обеспечивает семью. Махмадшариф обратился за кредитом, потому что хочет увеличить поголовье скота и сохранить бизнес. На заемные средства приобрести скотов и сохранить бизнес.
texts.en:
This guy is Mahmadsharif. He comes from a Rumy region. He is 25 years old. Mahmadsharif is one of those people who is never afraid to work hard, and he is always moving forward. He is a serious, honest, and a hard-working guy. 
Mahmadsharif has been involved in breeding beef cattle for 2 years now. His father is a taxi driver.
Mahmadsharif is not married yet but he plans to get married. 
He buys young calves and fattens them up for a couple months. Then he resells them at a cattle market. 
Cattle breeding is his main occupation, as the income from this business provides for the family. 
Mahmadsharif has applied for the loan in order to increase the headcount of his livestock and retain the business. 
He will use the loan to buy more cattle and keep the business running.

loans.use: to increase the livestock headcount and retain the business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chairs to improve her reception services.

loans.name: Grupo Unido Group

texts.es:
El comité llamado Grupo Unido  es un grupo nuevo que está dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, entre las que se destaca la Sra. Liz, quien a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo está logrando mejorar su vida.
Liz se dedica a las ventas, y comenta que pide este préstamo para poder comprar anillos, pulseras  y otros, lo que le ayudará  a poder crecer y mejorar cada día.
Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora que está poniendo su entusiasmo y esfuerzo para poder dar a su familia una vida digna y sin privaciones.
texts.en:
The committee named Grupo Unido is a new group in our program to eliminate poverty.

From among its members Senora Liz stands out as someone who by her continuous efforts and work has managed to improve her life.

Liz's business is selling things, and with this loan she will be able to buy rings, bracelets, and other items that will help her business to grow and improve each day.

She is a very hardworking woman who uses all her enthusiasm and effort to help give her family a life of dignity, in which nothing is lacking.

loans.use: to buy rings, bracelets, and other items to sell.

loans.name: Miraflores De Huatta Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “MIRAFLORES DE HUATTA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Huancarani, perteneciente a la provincia de Paucartambo y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Carlota ella es soltera y tiene 31 años y tiene 4 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de crianza de pollos y cuyes, la socia los pollos los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en las diferentes mercados, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los pollos. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar pollos y cuyes y alimentos para los pollos y cuyes.
	
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de agricultura, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members participate in the communal bank "Miraflores de Huatta", located in the Huancarani district belonging to the Paucartambo province and Cusco department .

Carlota is single and is 31 years old with 4 children. She works in her business raising chickens and guinea pigs, fattening and growing them and later selling them in different markets. She has been in this business for many years and it is going well for her. Her dream is to have a place where she can sell the chickens. She is seeking a loan to buy chickens and guinea pigs and food for the chickens and guinea pigs.

The other members work selling animals, in agriculture, in grocery stores, and selling food.

She expresses her gratitude to those who make up part of this dream through this medium and promises to keep up with her payments and deadlines.

loans.use: to buy chickens and guinea pigs and food for the chickens and guinea pigs.

loans.name: Blanca Estela

texts.es:
Blanca, tiene 50 años de edad, es soltera, tiene tres hijos de 25, 23 y 18 años de edad, todos ya son independientes y han formado su hogar, su fuente de ingresos por más de 15 años ha sido la venta de ropa, lo realiza de martes a sábado, aprendió a desempeñar está actividad de su madre.
El crédito lo utilizara para comprar camisas, faldas, chores, pantalones, blusas, etc., para ambos sexos, adultos y niños, incrementara su mercadería y tendrá a sus clientes satisfechos, realizará la inversión con el objetivo de tener más ingresos para cumplir con sus obligaciones.
Sus aspiraciones son seguir mejorando el negocio y tener un patrimonio para ayudar a su familia a tener una vida más digna.
texts.en:
Blanca is 50 years old and is single. She has three children aged 25, 23 and 18 years old who are all independent and have formed their own households. For more than 15 years her source of income has been selling clothing which she does from Tuesday to Saturday. She learned to carry out this business from her mother.

She will use the loan to buy shirts, skirts, shorts, pants, blouses, etc. for both sexes, adult and children, to increase her inventory and satisfy her customers. She will make the investment with the goal of having more income to meet her obligations. Her ambition is to continue to improve her business and have assets to help her family have a more dignified life.

loans.use: to buy shirts, skirts, shorts, pants, blouses, etc. for both sexes, adult and children to increase her inventory and satisfy her customers.

loans.name: Joana

texts.pt:
A Senhora Joana é solteira e tem 2 filhos que andam na escola, vive com os filhos, a irma mais nova e a mãe. Ela é policia  e com o presente empréstimo irá adiquirir fardos de roupa usada para revenda, aumentando o seu rendimento visto que tem dificuldades financeiras para o sustento da familia isso porque todos dependem dela pois o pai dos filhos não tem contribuido para o sustento dos mesmos.
O seu maior sonho é, casar, ter casa propria e constituir uma familia
texts.en:
Joana is single and has two children who are in school. She lives with her children, her mother and her younger sister. She's a police officer and with the current loan she'll purchase bundles of used clothing for re-selling. That way she'll improve her income, since she struggles to support her family. All her family members depend on her because the father of her children hasn't been contributing to their support.
Her biggest dream is to get married, be a home owner and start her own family.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of used clothing for re-selling.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
19 son las mujeres que integran este grupo, ellas son Mujeres Emprendedoras están en el ciclo 3, cada una está esforzándose para poder crecer y dar a sus familias lo que ellas no han podido tener. Están iniciando este ciclo con muchas expectativas de superación y mejora en sus vidas.
Gloria, una de las integrantes se dedica a las ventas, tiene una pequeña despensa que pudo montar con su esfuerzo, y la ha ido mejorando poco a poco por medio de su trabajo y su esfuerzo. Gloria es una mujer muy dedicada a sus seres queridos y quiere darles todo lo que ella no pudo tener.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de bebidas, enlatados, productos a granel y otros, para poder seguir con sus ventas luchando por mejorar y crecer cada día. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder crecer cada día.
texts.en:
There are 19 women who make up this group called Women Entrepreneurs. They are in their 3rd loan cycle, and each one is striving to grow and give her family things they have never been able to have. They are starting this cycle with high expectations to surpass themselves and improve their lives.

Gloria, one of the group members, earns her living through sales. She has a small store that she set up through her own effort, and has been improving little by little through her work and continued efforts. Gloria is very dedicated to her loved ones and wants to give them everything she couldn't have.

She is requesting this loan to invest in drinks, canned goods, dry grains, and other products so she can continue with her store, fighting to improve and grow with each day.

She is thankful for the opportunity she is given to grow day by day.

loans.use: to buy drinks, canned goods, dry grains and other products.

loans.name: Shaydullo

texts.ru: Шайдулло житель района Чиликул. В Чиликуле хорошая погода для развития сельскохозяйственной деятельности. Шайдулло в районе занимается земледелием. Он родился и вырос в районе Чиликул. Он был помощникам отца, помогал папе работать на земле и он освоил деятельность отца. Сейчас Шайдулло идет по стопам отца. Ему нравится работать на земле, и зарабатывать честно нажитым трудом. Он женат и имеет детей. Жена тоже занимается земледелием. Им на работе помогает дети. Шайдулло в этом году решил, посадит морковь. Он готовил почву к новому посеву, но у него нет семян морковь. По этой причине Шайдулло просит кредит. Вы можете поддержать его!
texts.en:
Shaydullo lives in a Jilikul region. Jilikul has good weather conditions for agriculture development. Shaydullo is involved in farming in the region. 
He was born and also grew up in Jilikul. He helped his father with the work on the field, thus he mastered his father's occupation. Now Shaydullo is following his father's footsteps. He likes to work on the field and provide for himself with honest day's work.
He is married and has children. His wife is also involved in farming. Their children also help with the work.
This year Shaydullo decided to plant carrots. He prepared the soil for the new planting but he has no carrot seeds. For this reason Shaydullo has applied for the loan. You could support him in this matter!

loans.use: to buy carrot seeds

loans.name: Sumac Quilla Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SUMAC QUILLA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Zenilda Lelia ella es conviviente y tiene 32 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de ropa, la socia vende ropa para niños como pantalones, blusas,chompas y polos, la socia es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora que por medio de ste negocio la socia quiere sacar adelante a su familia. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar zapatos, polos, pantalones, chompas, polos y blusas.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de computadoras, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de internet.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank "Sumac Quilla". This bank is located in the Cusco District, part of the Cusco Province within the Department of Cusco.

The member is Zenilda Lelia: she is 32 years old, lives with her partner and has three children. The member works in her own business selling clothes. She sells children's clothing, such as trousers, blouses, sweaters and T-shirts. The member is an enterprising and courageous woman, who wants to get her family ahead through her business. She is requesting a loan to buy shoes, T-shirts, trousers, sweaters and blouses.

The other members make a living selling computers and selling clothes, running grocery stores and running internet cafes.

The member thanks those who, through this loan, are part of her dream. She promises to make her payments within the agreed time period.

loans.use: to buy shoes, T-shirts, trousers, sweaters and blouses.

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah is a single woman and mother of 2 children. She describes herself as industrious. She operates a retail business where she sells clothes, shoes, and handbags. She has been involved in this business for 10 years. Her business is located in a busy area and her primary customers are locals. 

Her biggest business challenge to low inventory.  She will use the 80,000 KES loan to buy inventory of clothes and handbags. 

She hopes that in the future, she will have a better life. This is her fifth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more inventory of clothes and handbags

loans.name: Milagros

texts.en:
Milagros is 62 years old, married, and has five children.

Milagros is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. Milagros requested a 19,500 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Milagros has been in pig fattening for 19 years now, and has borrowed 18 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Milagros would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Lily

texts.en:
Lily is a 66-year-old widow and mother of 3 sons.  All three of her sons are independent, and she lives alone.

She needs a loan to fix the walls of her home.  Lily is a retired person and she collects a retirement payment every month, but that is not enough for her, which is why she needs your help.

loans.use: to fix the walls of her home

loans.name: El Progreso Group

texts.es:
El grupo de comité se llama El Progreso, y está empezando su primer ciclo, son de la ciudad de Curuguaty, una zona de difícil acceso, donde tienen escaso acceso a la educación y con poca seguridad. Ellas son muy sacrificadas y están luchando para poder mejorar.
La Sra. Norma es una de las integrantes de este grupo ella es una microempresaria, tiene una despensa bien surtida que monto en su casa. Ella es una señora que tiene ganas de superación y esta participando en este grupo porque tiene ganas de trabajar para asi tener un mejor futuro y poder brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
Norma pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para surtir su despensa con productos variados, como verduras, frutas, pollos, panificados, bebidas, embutidos y otros. Cada una de las integrantes está luchando por mejorar su vida y la de sus seres queridos.
texts.en:
This lending group is called El Progreso, and is beginning its first cycle. The members live in the town of Curuguaty, an isolated area that is difficult to reach, where access to education is limited and security very poor. They lead a sparse life and are struggling to improve.

Norma is one of the members of this group, who has her own micro-business. She has a well-stocked store that she set up in her house. She is a person who wants to better herself and her life, and is participating in this group because she wants to work in order to have a better future and be able to offer her family a better quality of life.

Norma is requesting this loan to buy supplies so she can stock her store with a variety of products such as vegetables, fruit, chicken, baked goods, drinks, meats, and others.

Every member of this group is working to improve their life and the lives of their loved ones.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as vegetables, fruit, chicken, baked goods, drinks, meats, and others.

loans.name: Anibal

texts.es:
El Sr. Anibal  tiene 52 años, está en pareja, vive en la ciudad de San Lorenzo, comente que se inició siendo muy joven realizando trabajos como ayudante de construcción con su padre  y  luego fue aprendiendo el  oficio de constructor. Actualmente trabaja de forma independiente.
Gracias a su actividad puede llevar una vida digna y mantener a su familia. Comenta siempre tiene trabajos por realizar ya que siempre trata de acomodar el precio a los clientes. Anibal ha demostrado ser una persona muy responsable y honesta.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar una mezcladora para poder usarlo en su trabajo de constructor, y lo cual le facilitará mucho para poder seguir mejorando su servicio.
texts.en:
Anibal is 52 years old, and lives with his spouse in the town of San Lorenzo. He says that he started working with his father as his assistant on construction projects when he was very young. With time he learned the craft of constructor. He now works independently.

Thanks to this work he can live a dignified life and support his family. He says that he always has work to do because he always tries to give his clients a good price. Anibal has shown himself to be a very responsible and honest person.

He is requesting this loan to buy a cement mixer to use in his construction work, which will make it much easier for him to continue improving the services he offers.

loans.use: to buy a cement mixer.

loans.name: Ruzigul'

texts.ru: Рузигуль 37 лет. Она замужем и мать двоих сыновей. Сыновьям 17 и 15 лет. Муж работает загранице. Рузигуль домохозяйка, но сидя дома не сидит без дел и сама зарабатывает, предоставляя услуги портнихи. Она давняя рукодельница, шить и кроить научила ее мама. Такая работа приносит ей ежедневные средства. В течение 10 лет пользуется таким ремеслом. Для нее время, проведенное за швейной машинкой, доставляет больше удовольствие. Рузигуль шьет женские одежды. Она берет кредит для расширения бизнеса и увеличения бюджета. За счет кредита Рузигуль хочет купить электрическую современную швейную машинку. Она рассчитывает на Вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Ruzigul' is 37 years old. She is married, and is a mother to two sons. Her sons are 17 and 15 years old. Her husband is working abroad. Ruzigul' is a housewife but she doesn't just idly sit at home - she earns money by providing seamstress services. She has been a needlewoman for a long time, she was taught to cut and sew the fabrics by her mother. This work brings her daily income. She has been involved in this craft for 10 years now. 
Ruzigul' really enjoys the time spent with her sewing machine. She sews women's clothing. 
Ruzigul' has applied for the loan to expand the business and increase her budget. She wants to use the loan to buy a modern electrical sewing machine. She hopes for your kind help.

loans.use: to buy a modern electrical sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, and steel to repair his floor and roof.

loans.name: Irish Grace

texts.en:
Irish Grace is a 26-year-old entrepreneur from Talibon, Bohol.  Irish Grace has owned a small grocery store for 2 years now. She sells items like rice, sugar, oil, soy sauce, soda, shampoo, canned foods, chocolate drinks, candies, and chips. The business is the source of her daily income. 

Irish Grace needs to make further investments in her store; however, she lacks the funds to do so. She is requesting a loan to buy additional items of merchandise to sell like canned goods, vinegar, salt, rice, sugar, sodas, seasonings, milk, coffee, and cooking oil.

With the loan, Irish Grace will be able to increase her inventory to attract more customers, thus giving her the chance of increasing her sales for her two children. Irish Grace hopes to make her business grow and become more sustainable.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, vinegar, salt, rice, sugar, sodas, seasoning, milk, coffee, and cooking oil

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is a married man. He describes himself as active. He operates a motorcycle transport business. He has been involved in this business for 5 years. His business is located in a busy area and his primary customers are locals. 

His biggest business challenge is insufficient working capital. He will use the 60,000 KES loan to pay for maintenance of his motorcycle. 

This is his second loan with SMEP Microfinance bank.  The previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to pay for maintenance of his motorcycle

loans.name: Mary Joy

texts.en:
Mary Joy is 29 years old and a very hard-working entrepreneur.

Mary Joy has a food-vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for one year. Mary Joy requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy ingredients and materials, such as frozen foods, spices, meat, bamboo sticks, etc., for her business.

In the future, Mary Joy would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and materials like frozen foods, spices, meat, bamboo sticks, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Mariposa De Oro Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario Mariposa de oro está conformado por tres mujeres laboriosas, quienes han logrado ir sacando adelante su negocio con su esfuerzos, el grupo es coordinado por Sonia de 30 años, casada y madre de dos hijos que están a su cargo, ella se dedica a la venta de refrescos, helados y repostería hace siete años, trabaja en conjunto con su mama y hermana quienes la apoyan en el negocio, solicita por tercer vez el financiamiento de los socios de kiva para la compra de frutas como naranja, melón, cacao, papaya y piña. La segunda socia es Karla de 33 años de edad quien se dedica a la venta de bisutería. La tercer socia es Brenda quien se dedica a la venta de prendas.
texts.en:
The solidarity gorup "Mariposa de Oro" is made up of three hard-working women, who have succeeded in getting their businesses ahead through their efforts. The group is led by Sonia, 30 years old, who is married and a mother of two children who are in her care.

She has worked selling beverages, ice creams and confectionary goods for seven years. She works with her mother and sister who help with the business. This is the third loan the members are requesting through Kiva. She will buy fruit such as oranges, melons, cacao, papaya and pineapple for her business.

The second member is Karla, 33 years old who works selling costume jewelry. The third member is Brenda who works selling clothing.

loans.use: to buy fruit for her business.

loans.name: Maricela

texts.en:
Maricela is 40 years old and lives in the municipality of La Dorada with her partner. Last year she decided to start her own business so she and her family can have a better quality of life. She owns a store that she started because it is a job she loves to do and that she learned by herself.

For her it is really important to make sure that her business can last in time, because she’s aware that to be sustainable is not only something really hard to achieve, but is what defines the success of any business. Now she wants to invest in her store so she can accomplish that. She asked for a loan so she can buy more inputs like dairy consumable products and to do some location improvements.

Maricela dreams with one day be able to repair her house, because it has some damages that don’t let her feel save. You can help her with a loan and let her work hard to accomplish all her dreams.

loans.use: buy more inputs like dairy consumable products and to do some location improvements.

loans.name: Sildana

texts.en:
Sildana is 44 years old and lives in the municipality of Mariquita, place where she’s been working since 1988, more than 20 years in a business of raising cattle. She started doing her job because she loves the farm life, and learned by herself, something she feels very proud of. 

She wants her business to prosper, and now wants to optimize her business by increasing the production and reducing the waste, which will help to improve the sales too. She’s asking for a loan to accomplish that and to buy more pigs and chickens, to fix the pigsty and barns, and to buy feed for the animals. 

She dreams of buying her own house so she and her family can live comfortably and safe;  a dream that she always saw like something hard to accomplish, but now with a little help, she is closer to attaining it.  Your support  can do a lot for Sildana.

loans.use: to buy more pigs and chickens, to fix the pigsty and barns, and to buy feed for the animals

loans.name: Luis Eladio

texts.en:
Luis is 42 years old and lives in the municipality of La Unión, in the Atlantic Colombian coast. He has 5 children, 4 daughters and one son, between 20 and 1 years old, and since the first girl was born, he knew he would do anything for his family. He owns a business where he raises cattle, loves doing it.

He wants to improve his sales, increase his clients, and he also wants to be more competitive and to see his business prosper.  He knows that an investment can help him accomplish a lot of things. He’s asking for a loan so he can buy more pigs and feed for them.

Luis has a lot of dreams, but the most important one is in regards to his children, because he works and lives for their wellbeing.  He wishes he can pay for a good education for all of them so they can be successful professionals. You can help Luis to accomplish his dreams, you support can do a lot.

loans.use: to buy more pigs and feed for them

loans.name: Paula Ramona

texts.es: Doña paula es una mujer laboriosa de 33 años de edad, casada y madre de cuatro hijos quienes son su mayor motivación para sacarlos adelante y darles una mejor  educación, ella se dedica a la venta de lotería desde hace diez años, por lo que solicita por sexto ciclo el financiamiento de la institución para compra de billetes de lotería. Con los financiamientos anteriores logro construir su vivienda.
texts.en: Paula is a hard-working 33 year old woman. She is married and has four children who are her biggest motivation to be able to give them a better life and a better education. For the last ten years she's been selling lottery tickets and she is now requesting a sixth cycle of financing from the institution to buy lottery tickets. With the previous loans she was able to build her house.

loans.use: to buy lottery tickets

loans.name: Jose Joaquin

texts.en:
José is a 48 year old married man who lives in the municipality of Chinu, in the Colombian Atlantic coast. There he lives with his family of 5 children, 3 daughters and 2 sons.  His children are between the ages or 20 and 5 years of age, and they are the motor of José’s life and why he works hard, because there are days that he can work for 15 hours in his business.  

He owns a business raising cattle. He cares a lot about how his business evolves, so one of his dreams is to see his business prosper. He wants to improve the sales, that´s why he wants to invest in it, and he’s asking for a loan so he can buy more pigs to be raised and feed for them. 

José has many dreams, but almost all of them are regarding his children.  He hopes one day his business can be managed by them; he also wants to give all of them the best education he can. You can help this responsible man to accomplish all his dreams with just a loan.

loans.use: to buy more pigs and feed for them

loans.name: Las Glorias 2 Group

texts.es: Las glorias 2 es un grupo conformado por tres mujeres emprendedoras conformado por doña gloria de 58 años, viuda y madre de tres hijos quienes son mayores de edad e independientes, ella se dedica a la venta de refrescos hace siete años y solicita por quinceava vez el financiamiento en la institución para la compra de  frutas como naranja, melon, guayaba, cacao y  leche uno de sus proyectos es comprar una máquina de coser para dedicarse a la costura, con las ganancias del crédito anterior logro comprar un equipo de sonido. La segunda socia es doña Facundina de 55 años quien se dedica a la venta de sopa y comida. La tercer socia es la joven Rebeca de 19 años quien se dedica a la venta de cosméticos.
texts.en:
Las Glorias 2 is a group composed of three entrepreneurial women.

Gloria, 58 years old, is a widow and mother of three children, who are adults and independent. She has been making a living from the sale of soft drinks for seven years now. She is requesting a loan for the fifteenth time from the institution, which will be used for the purchase of fruit, such as orange, melon, guava, cacao and milk. One of her projects is to buy a sewing machine to make a living from sewing. With the income from the previous loan she managed to buy a sound system.

The second partner is Facundina, who is 55 years old and makes a living selling soup and food. The third partner is young Rebeca, who is 19 years old and makes a living selling cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy fruits, such as orange, melon, guava, cacao and milk

loans.name: Ma. Celiet

texts.en:
Ma. Celiet is a married woman and mother of two children from Calituban Island in Talibon, Bohol.  Her children are 11 and 12 years old. She and her husband are engaged in fishing. This has been their source of income for 15 years now. 

She is asking a loan to buy a new fish net, pay for boat repairs, and pay for school fees. Ma. Celiet knows how important it is to keep the boat functional and maintain sturdy fish nets to catch more fish. 

Her income will go towards her children’s education, healthy meals, savings, and reinvestment in the same business.

loans.use: to buy a new fish net, pay for boat repairs, and pay for school fees

loans.name: Henry Alberto

texts.en:
Henry is 34 years old and lives in the municipality of Dabeiba; he owns a business growing fruits since 2008, which he started for economic needs.  Unfortunately, lately, the business is not doing that well because it has a lot of competition, and not much production.

He’s aware of his problems, and that’s why he wants to invest in his business, so he can be more competitive, and can increase his yield, and his profits too. He asked for a loan so he can buy wire, fertilizers, and poison that he expects will improve his business. 

Right now, his house needs some repairs that he hasn’t done because he lacks the money to do it. He expects that with the loan he can not only invest in his business, but with the profits, invest in his house too. This dream can become real with a little help from you; a loan will do a lot for Henry.

loans.use: to buy wire, fertilizers, and poison

loans.name: Jairo Ivan

texts.en:
Jairo is a 19 year old young man who lives in the municipality of La Dorada. For a while he’s been thinking of starting his own business, and he decided he should.  He wants to be independent and help his family. Some time ago a friend taught him how to start a selling business, and now he´s ready to do it. 

He´s aware that a successful business can be measured in how much it lasts in time, so he’s main objective is that it can be sustainable.  He needs a loan so he can begin his business, by buying clothes, accessories, and lotions that he can start to sell to some clients that he already has. 

He dreams big, and he’s ready to work really hard to achieve that. In addition, he wants to do some repairs to his house, that right now is in bad condition. You can help Jairo to have a good start and get closer to his dreams with a loan.

loans.use: to begin his business, by buying clothes, accessories, and lotions

loans.name: Maria Margoth

texts.es:
Margoth, es madre de 8 hijos, ella estudio hasta tercer grado, está casada, su esposo trabaja en la agricultura y con ellos solo viven 4 de sus hijos.

Margoth, se ha dedicado a trabajar elaborando quesos, pasteles, quesadilla etc. todo para sostener a su familia, mientras sus hijos crecian y trabajaban.

Margoth, necesita el crédito para comprar insumos agricolas para hacer su mailpa y para comprar materia prima para elaborar los quesos, los pasteles y las quesadillas, con eso espera tener ganancias y tener los granos básicos para el proxino año.

Margoth, espera poder progresar en su negocio y que su milpa dé una buena cosecha, para poder salir adelante día con día.
texts.en:
Margoth is a mother of 8 children, studied until the third grade, and is married. Her husband works in agriculture and only four of their children are living with them. She works making cheese, pies, quesadillas etc. all in order to support her family, while her children grow and work.

She needs the loan to buy farming supplies to prepare her cornfield and to buy raw material to make cheese, pies and quesadillas. With this she hopes to make a profit and have the basic grains for the next year.

She hopes to be able to advance in her business and that her cornfield gives a good harvest, so that she is able to get ahead day by day.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies and raw materials to make cheese, pies and quesadillas.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy vegetables, breads, drinks, tinned products and various bulk products.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase some materials such as; zinc, cement; nails, etc.

loans.name: Chanrith

texts.en:
Chanrith is 33-year-old woman with three children, one attends school. She is a resident living in the Prey Chhor district of Kampong Cham province.

She has grown cassava and rice for 15 years and earns 50,000 KHR per day. She can save 30,000 KHR each day. Insect have negatively affected production. This is the first request for 2,000,000 KHR and she will use it to buy organic fertilizer. She hopes to make a profit and upgrade her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Angelina

texts.es:
Angelina, de 48 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado en la escuela de su cantón, es viuda, tiene dos hijos, pero solo su hija vive con ella, porque su otro hijo está en E.E.U.U. 

Angelina, tiene varios años de elaborar pan artesanal para vender, dentro de los producto que elabora está: pan de torta, pastelitos de piña, quesadillas; su hija le apoya en la elaboración y venta del pan; antes de dedicarse a ello, hacia tamales, aún hace pero en menores cantidades.

El crédito que está solicitando es para comprar materia prima para la elaboración del pan y así poder seguir trabajando en su negocio.

Angelina, sueña con distribuir pan en otros cantones y caseríos, para producir más y poder mejorar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Angelina is 48 years old and studied until the second grade in the school in her canton. She is a widow and has two children, but only one daughter lives with her because her son is in the United States.

She has worked for a few years making traditional bread to sell. Among the products she makes are: sandwich bread, small pineapple pastries, and quesadillas. Her daughter helps her make and sell the bread. Before she was doing this work, she was making tamales, although she still does, but in less quantities.

The loan she is requesting is to buy ingredients to make bread, and so continue working in her business. She dreams of distributing bread to other cantons and towns in order to produce more and be able to increase her profits.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make bread to sell.

loans.name: Aquita

texts.en:
A $1000 loan is offered to Aguita to improve her business. She is married with three children. Her husband is a farmer, and she has a kiosk where many people come to shop every day. She will buy some additional supplies such as milk, coffee, sugar, salt, cigarettes and books. She has been involving herself in business activities since 2010. She feels so comfortable running her business because she can earn money every day.

Running a business has made Aguita independent because she can be responsible for herself and also help her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future. She is happy with this loan because of improving her living conditions in the future.

loans.use: to buy milk, coffee, sugar, salt, cigarettes and books.

loans.name: Doda

texts.en:
Doda is from Concepcion, Iloilo. She is married and has four adult children. Out of these four children, she has only one school aged child aged 20 years old. Her husband works hard as a businessman. To earn a living, she helps her husband. 

She is asking for a loan to help them sustain their livelihood. She is requesting an amount to buy furniture materials such as various types of woods. 

In the future, Doda wants to improve their business to have a better means of living.

loans.use: to buy various types of wood

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer is a 29-year-old woman from San Dionisio, Iloilo. She is married and has two sons. Her oldest child is 11 years old, while the youngest child is still 10 months old. 

Jennifer and her husband are doing chainsawing to earn a living. They have been doing this for two years to sustain their daily needs. She is asking for a loan to have enough capital to buy gasoline and timber. 

In the future, Jennifer hopes to improve their livelihood to have a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy gasoline and timber

loans.name: Hiedi

texts.en:
Hiedi has been involved in a sari-sari store business for 33 years. She is from San Dionisio, Iloilo. She is married and blessed with three daughters ages 20, 15 and ten years old. Her husband works hard as a businessman. 

Hiedi is requesting a loan to buy inventory for her sari-sari store such as assorted fruits and vegetables like mangoes, banana fruit, and squash. She also wants to buy sacks of rice to sell and some grocery items such as spices, toiletries, eggs, cooking oil, coffee, and sugar. 

In the future, she wants to improve her business to earn enough to send all her children to college.

loans.use: to buy mangoes, banana fruit, squash, sacks of rice, spices, toiletries, eggs, cooking oil, coffee, and sugar

loans.name: 30 De Mayo Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario 30 de mayo está conformado por cuatro mujeres emprendedoras, quienes han luchado por engrandecer sus negocios y maximizar sus ganancias con la responsabilidad y empeño por salir adelante, pero sobre todo gracias a la institución que le ha ayudado con el financiamientos de créditos, ellas solicitan por veinteava vez el financiamiento de la institución. La coordinadora del grupo es Elizabeth de 28 años de edad, casada y madre de un bebe de seis meses, su actividad económica es la venta de Elotes, atol y yoltamal desde hace nueve años, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de maíz, elote, leche y canela. Con las ganancias de créditos anteriores logro aumentar sus ventas. Reyna de 33 años y Juana de 53 también se dedican a la venta de elotes y atol. La cuarta socia es Nohemí quien se dedica a la venta de ropa.
texts.en:
The solidarity group 30 de mayo [30th may] comprises four female entrepreneurs, who have strived to grow their businesses and maximise their profits with determination and responsibility. Above all, thanks to the institution that has helped them to secure credit, they are requesting a loan from them for the twentieth time.  

The group’s leader is Elizabeth, who is 28 years old, married and mother of a six-month-old baby, she has been selling corn on the cob, cornflour drinks and tamales [cornflour dough pastries] for nine years.  She is requesting the loan to buy corn, maize, milk and cinnamon.  With the profits from previous loans she has managed to increase her sales.  

Reyna (33 years old) and Juana (53 years old) also make a living selling corn and cornflour drinks.  The fourth member is Nohemí who sells clothes.

loans.use: to buy corn, maize, milk and cinnamon.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is a married man with 1 child. He describes himself as honest. He is a carpenter and has made furniture for 5 years. His primary customers are local people. He describes his biggest business challenge as insufficient capital. He will use 20,000 KES to buy carpentry materials.

This is his first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy carpentry materials.

loans.name: Terencia

texts.en:
Terencia, is a 52-year-old married woman with one grown child. She has operated a sari-sari (variety) store to sell noodles, tooth paste, salt, sugar, shampoo, bar soap, and seasonings for 5 years.

She is asking for a loan to buy beverages, toiletries, and assorted canned goods. These will help maintain her inventory, attract more buyers, and improve her earnings.

She is hoping that she will be able to manage her livelihood properly for the welfare of her family in the years to come.

loans.use: to buy  beverages, toiletries, and assorted canned goods.

loans.name: Altagracia Group

texts.es: El grupo Altagracia está conformado por tres mujeres con muchas características en común:                                                responsables, emprendedoras y con muchos deseos de superación, el grupo es coordinado por Linda una joven laboriosa de 23 años de edad, casada y madre de un bebe de un año, ella se dedica a la venta de comida hace tres años, trabaja con el apoyo de su mamá quien también prepara los alimentos, solicita por séptima vez el financiamiento en la institución para la compra de pollo, carne, arroz, plátano, frijoles y vegetales, porque una de sus metas es aumentar la oferta de platillos en el negocio, gracias a las ganancias de créditos anteriores logro remodelar su cocina. La segunda socia es Fátima de 43 años propietaria de una pulpería y Ana de 41 años propietaria de un salón de belleza.
texts.en:
The group Altagracia consists of three women with many characteristics in common: they are responsible, entrepreneurial, and with a lot of drive for self-improvement.  

The group is led by Linda, a hardworking young woman who is 23 years old, married and mother to a one-year-old baby.  She has been making a living selling food for three years, she works with the support of her mother who also helps to prepare the food, she is requesting a loan for the seventh time to buy chicken, meat, rice, bananas, beans and vegetables.  One of her goals is to expand her menu; thanks to previous loans she was able to refurbish her kitchen.  

The second member is Fátima, 43, who owns a grocery store and the third is Ana, 41, who owns a beauty parlour.

loans.use: to buy chicken, meat, rice, bananas, beans and vegetables.

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is a 30-year-old woman from Getafe. Together with her husband, she is raising hogs and farming rice to support their four children. They are ages 1, 2, 8 and 12.

She is asking for a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy feed and to start a sari-sari (convenience) store business. Mary Jane hopes that with her business, she will be on the way to progress and a better life for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and to have capital to start a sari-sari (convenience) store business

loans.name: Pilar

texts.es:
Pilar tiene 54 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos, vive con su familia en este mismo distrito de Oyotún, en una zona rural, de la Provincia de Chilcayo, Región Lambayeque, Costa norte de Perú. Es una comunidad dedicada al comercio, la agricultura y la ganadería mayormente.

Pilar se dedica a la venta de gaseosas,cervezas y marcianos; además de abarrotes con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio, solicita préstamo para capital de trabajo, compra de más gaseosa y cerveza, dicha inversión le servirá para incrementar sus ventas, con gran influencia en el negocio; piensa tener mayor stock de productos para poder atender las diversas necesidades, con lo que aumentará su volumen de ventas, y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Pilar is fifty-four years old, single, and has no children. She lives with her family in the district Oyotún, a rural area in Chilcayo Province which is in the Lambayeque Region on the north coast of Peru. It’s a community mainly dedicated to commerce, agriculture, and livestock.

Pilar works selling soft drinks, beer, and marcianos (Peruvian frozen fruit pops). In addition to groceries, she has more than ten years of experience in business. She’s applying for a loan for working capital to buy more soft drinks and beer. This investment will help to increase her sales, greatly influencing her business. She thinks with more products she’ll be able to meet different needs. With it, she will increase her number of sales and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to increase the stock of her business

loans.name: Zenona

texts.en:
Zenona earns a living by selling fresh fish. Her husband goes fishing while Zenona is in charge of peddling her husband's catch. For almost 10 years now she has been engaged in selling fish to the local community. She is a 59-year-old married woman with five grown dependents. She needs capital to support the family's main source of income.

She is asking for a loan to buy fishing net, weights and materials for motor boat repair like plywood and epoxy (adhesive). These materials would help improve her husband's catch and provide a better means of transportation also. In this way, she could sell more volume of fish and could generate more income. Thus it will enable her to pay her obligations and purchase nutritious diets.

She is hoping that her livelihood will be productive and sustainable in the future to come.

loans.use: to buy fishing net, weights and materials for motor boat repair like plywood and epoxy (adhesive).

loans.name: Reyes

texts.es:
Reyes tiene 58 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge en casa propia de material rústico en el caserío Playa Azul, distrito de Pucará que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Reyes se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de cacao, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 10 años y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para realizar un adecuado mantenimiento de su cultivo de cacao así como para la contratación de mano de obra para la época de cosecha. Con esto Reyes espera ofrecer un cacao de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
58-year-old Reyes lives with his spouse in their own home made of rustic materials in the village of Playa Azul, district of Pucara, province of Jaen, region of Cajamarca, in Peru's northern highlands. Life in the village is calm and its inhabitants mainly work in agriculture, commerce and cattle raising. 

Reyes works in agriculture, specifically growing cocoa. He has 10 years of experience in this field and has very good personal and work references in the region. He will use the loan to buy fertilizers to adequately maintain his cocoa crops, as well as to hire labor during the harvest season. Reyes hopes to be able to offer better quality cocoa to his customers, which will positively impact his income level and his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to adequately maintain his cocoa crops.

loans.name: Concepción

texts.es:
Concepción, de 45 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, no tuvo más oportunidades de seguir estudiando, es viuda, vive con su hija de 19 años de edad y su otro hijo trabaja para colaborar con los gastos del hogar. 

Concepción, desde que se casó con su esposo hace 35 años aproximadamente, ella aprendió a criar cerdos y desde que él falleció, ella maneja la pequeña granja de cerdos que su esposo le dejó, la granja está en su casa y su hija le ayuda con el negocio, pero además de la granja, siembran granos básicos para consumo.

Concepción, necesita el crédito para comprar alimento para los cerdos y para terminar de construir una porqueriza.

Concepción, sueña con que su granja crezca cada día más y que pueda generar los ingresos suficientes para apoyar a su hija para que estudie en la universidad.
texts.en:
Concepción is 45 years old. She studied until grade 2 and did not have any other further opportunities to study. She is a widow and lives with her 19 year old daughter. Her other son works to contribute to the expenses of the home.
Since she got married, approximately 35 years ago, Concepción has learned how to raise pigs and since her husband passed away, she has managed the small pig farm that her husband left her. Their house is on the farm and her daughter helps her with the business. They also plant basic grains to eat. 
Concepción needs the loan to buy food for the pigs and to finish building a pigpen. 
Concepción dreams that her farm will grow more everyday and that she will be able to generate a sufficient income for her daughter to be able to study in university.

loans.use: to buy food for the pigs and to finish building a pigpen.

loans.name: Romana

texts.en: A loan of $1500.00 is offered to Romana  to improve her business. Romana  lives in Oecusse and is a married business women. She started a kiosk in 2010 with $ 500.00 and is still happy with the business. With her husband, she was going to add money to their principal amount to buy more additional supplies such as lighters, cigarettes, sardines, eggs, biscuits, cooking oils, slippers, sugar, soaps, noodles, candies, note books and other things to sell. Her husband is very supportive. She is happy with the loan from Tuba Rai Metin which provides working capital to buy more goods.

loans.use: to buy lighters, cigarettes, sardines, eggs, biscuits, cooking oil, slippers, sugar, soap, noodles, candies, note books, and other items to sell.

loans.name: Mujeres De Exito 1, 2 & 4 Group

texts.en:
Olga is one of the members of Mujeres de Exito 1, 2 & 4. Her group is located in the urban slums surrounding Santo Domingo, in a community district called Los Guaricanos. These fifteen women are dedicated to working hard and developing their businesses to bring changes to their families and their community.

Olga makes her home in a simple structure with two of her three children and with her long term partner. They live together in this neighborhood of scarce resources. She is excited to be taking out her seventh loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loans and grown her business. She sells hair product lines to beauty salons and women, and this loan is intended to purchase 25 kits of different brands of shampoo, conditioner, etc., to supply her customers. She will use the profits to cover her home expenses and to help her partner with their expenses at home. Also, she is planning to reinvest in the success of her business. She thanks you all for your support.

loans.use: To buy hair care products.

loans.name: Mujeres Activas Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario mujeres activas es conformado por tres mujeres laboriosas coordinado por Ana de 44 años de edad, soltera y madre de tres hijos independientes, ella es propietaria de una pulpería hace un año donde una de sus hijas le ayuda a atender a los clientes, solicita por primera vez el financiamiento en la institución para la compra de pan, avena, arroz, azúcar, aceite y huevo a fin de aumentar la cantidad de productos que se le ofrecen a los clientes, Ana es una mujer con visión y uno de sus proyectos futuros es poner un comedor en su comunidad, la segunda socia es Alejandrina de 42 años quien se dedica a la venta de tortillas y frijoles cocidos y la tercer socia es la joven Jessenia de 25 años propietaria de una pulpería.
texts.en: The "Mujeres Activas" group is composed of three hardworking women. It is coordinated by 44-year-old Ana, who is a single mother of three independent children. She owns a convenience store, where one of her daughters helps her with the customers. She is requesting a loan for the first time to buy bread, oats, rice, sugar, oil and eggs. This will allow her to increase the quantity of products on offer to customers. Ana is a woman with a vision and one of her future projects is to start a meal center in her community. The second group member is 42-year-old Alejandrina who sells tortillas and beans. The third member is 25-year-old Jessenia, who owns a convenience store.

loans.use: to buy bread, oats, rice, sugar, oil and eggs.

loans.name: We Love What We Are Doing - N23C02Ttbắcqthạch Group

texts.en:
Duyên is 37 years old and she is married with three children. She lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village; moreover, the life of people here is difficult because this region often suffers from natural disasters such as storms because it is near the sea.

She has had a retail business selling dry food and general things for eight years. The main hardship that Duyên faces is lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase and resell more items for her grocery store.

In 2013, Duyên joined Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution to improve her business. She has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. She is the leader of N23C02TTBắcQThạch, which consists of three members.

With her business profit, Duyên hopes for her family to be happy and healthy, to provide for her kids, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: To purchase and resell more items for her grocery store

loans.name: Nilda

texts.en:
Nilda is from San Dionisio, Iloilo. She is 56 years old and is engaged in buying and selling rice. She raised her three children by doing this business for the past 20 years. Her children have already grown up and have their own families.

Recently, Nilda has been working hard to sustain this business so she could save money for her future use. With this in mind, she is asking for a loan to buy sacks of rice to sell. She is also buying piglets and feed to have another source of income. In the future, she wants to increase her livelihood.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice to sell and to buy piglets and feed

loans.name: Melania

texts.en:
Melania is 50 years old and is from the community of Talibon in Bohol. She has been farming rice for five years now. Most of the time she earns PHP 5,000 during harvest season.

She is asking for a loan of PHP 7,000 to buy fertilizer for her farm. Her income will pay for her eight-year-old child’s school fees and give her family healthy meals. She wishes to send her child to college for a better life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Rosa Coralia

texts.es:
Rosa, ha detectado que su negocio es mucho más grande por lo que es necesario mantenerlo surtido, opta por un nuevo crédito para comprar cremas corporales, tratamientos para el cabello, cosméticos y fragancias, de esta manera tendrá los productos que sus clientes solicitan, el resto le ayudara para hacer reparaciones en su vivienda.
El crédito anterior lo utilizo para mejorar el inventario del negocio y mantenerse trabajando, sigue esmerándose para ampliar su negocio, remodelar su vivienda y darle a su familia un estilo de vida más digno.
texts.en:
Rosa has noticed that her business has grown, in order to keep it stocked she is choosing a new loan to buy body creams, hair treatments, cosmetics and perfumes.  This way she will have the products that her customers request.  The rest will be used to make repairs to her home. 

She used the last loan to improve her business’s inventory in order to keep working; she continues to go to a lot of effort to grow her business, refurbish her home and give her family a more sophisticated lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy hair treatments, cosmetics and perfumes, this way she will have the products her clients request.

loans.name: Pablo

texts.es:
Pablo, de 65 años de edad, está acompañado y es padre de 6 hijos, los cuales ya tienen sus propias familias. 

Pablo, se dedica a las labores agrícolas desde que tenía 12 años de edad, porque su padre le ensaño todo lo relacionado a la agricultura y le dio las herramientas para que él pudiera ejercerlo; a parte de dedicarse a la agricultura también cría cerdos de granja.

Pablo, necesita el crédito para comprar cerdos y mejorar la granja que ya tiene, por lo que es muy necesario el impulso y el apoyo que se le dará, para que mejore su pequeña granja de cerdos.

Pablo, sueña con mantenerse con su pequeña granja, para cubrir los gastos de su casa y vivir tranquilos con su esposa.
texts.en:
Pablo is 65 years old. He is in a common law relationship and has 6 children, who now have their own families. 
Pablo has worked in farming since he was 12 years old, because his father taught him everything he needed to know and gave him the tools for him to be able to practice it. In addition to farming, he also raises pigs.
Pablo needs a loan to buy pigs and improve his farm. The momentum and the support that the loan will provide is necessary to improve his small pig farm.
Pablo dreams of maintaining his small farm in order to cover the expenses of his home and to live peacefully with his wife.

loans.use: to buy pigs and improve his farm.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more vegetables such as tomatoes, cabbages, chilies, eggplants, water spinach, etc.

loans.name: Noreen

texts.en:
Noreen, age 30, is the mother of two children. Her husband owns a tailoring shop in the market, which is the only source of income for the family.

He needs to purchase a tailoring machine and a variety of tailoring materials for the shop, including threads, needles, clothing, etc. This is very important for him to continue his work efficiently and professionally. However, due to the lack of money, he is finding it difficult to do so.

Therefore his wife, Noreen is requesting a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan with the goal of helping her husband. He will purchase the needed items with the help of the loan amount.

Noreen is feeling happy that she will be able to help her husband with the loan amount. She is thankful to Kiva lenders and to BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy tailoring materials and a tailoring machine for her husband's tailoring shop

loans.name: Faustina

texts.es:
La socia Faustina se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de comida, la socia por medio de este negocio la socia quiere sacar adelante a su familia,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de comida. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar pollo, verduras, arroz y carne.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Faustina continues with her work selling food, through this business she wants to provide for her family.  Her dream is to expand her business selling food.  She is requesting this loan to buy chicken, vegetables, rice and meat.

Faustina is grateful for the loan and promises to comply with the repayment terms.

loans.use: to buy chicken, vegetables, rice and meat.

loans.name: Zulfiniso

texts.en:
Zulfiniso is a generous woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1966. She is living in a small town with her family. She is married and has three children.

She is a cleaning woman at a government agency. Every day she tries to trace clearness and orders at the organization. She is a responsible, hardworking, generous and punctual person.

Zulfiniso wishes to have educated children. She entered her daughter in university. Her salary is not enough to make the payment on time. She appealed to IMON, asking for financial support to pay for the higher education of her daughter. She hopes to be supported and awaits Kiva lenders' kindness.

loans.use: to pay for the higher education of her daughter

loans.name: Alba Jazmid

texts.es:
La constancia que demuestra Alba por lograr lo que se ha propuesto es admirable, una de sus metas era tener su propio negocio, y desde hace poco la cumplió, ahora trabaja con el propósito comprar su vivienda propia y brindarle a sus dos pequeños una mejor calidad de vida y buena estabilidad económica.

Alba se dedica a la cría y venta de aves, pero actualmente no cuenta con un buen capital de trabajo, es por esto que se encuentra solicitando un préstamo el cual lo invertirá en la compra de pollos de ganado, alimento para los mismos y arreglo de galpones.

Ayuda a esta mujer con miles de sueños por cumplir, anímese, haga un préstamo.
texts.en:
The perseverance that Alba demonstrates in achieving her goals is admirable. One of her goals was to have her own business, and she recently fulfilled it. Now she works towards the goal of buying her own home and providing her two little ones a better quality of life and economic stability.
